body:
## "How do I get more followers?" 

### Tell your own story. A lot of people don't know, for years I wrote a blog about trying to find love after divorce. That's where my early Twitter followers came from. Here's an example of a post from 2018, a story that still hurts...

1

I don't want to be a poet 
 I want to be a poet's poet 
 I want to be the poet that other poets read 
 I want to be the poet that other poets quote 
 I want to be the poet that other poets write about 
 I want to be the poet that other poets teach 
 I want to be the poet that other poets love 
 I want to be the poet that other poets admire 
 I want to be the poet that other poets emulate 
 I want to be the poet that other poets want to be

Before I used Go I used more dynamic languages like Python and Ruby, where you can pass any value anywhere and change class definitions or functions at runtime, whenever you want. Goâ€”and most other statically typed languages like C++, Rustâ€”don't allow you to do this. One of the things that I believe strongly about computers and that drives the way I look at them is that they are completely human-made, they are a world unto themselves that we created. In the end, a CPU is just a pile of very smart sand. If you think about that and take it to its logical conclusion you will realize that a programming language might have an official set of features, but it also has another set of possible features that can be made to happen if you combine the features of the language in the right way.

![Getting everyone to voluntarily give up their privacy by carrying recording devices on themselves at all times and planting them throughout their homes was every authoritarianâ€™s wet dream come true.](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/xPbPRt-4AeoQRHtxGJN1W.png?height=556&width=569)

* 
 Ã‰tait-il responsable de ce monde*â€‰*? Dans une certaine mesure oui, il appartenait Ã  lâ€™appareil dâ€™Ã‰tat, pourtant il nâ€™aimait pas ce monde. Et Bruno, il le savait, se serait lui aussi senti mal Ã  lâ€™aise avec ces burgers de crÃ©ation, ces espaces zen oÃ¹ lâ€™on pouvait se faire masser les cervicales le temps du trajet en Ã©coutant des chants dâ€™oiseaux, cet Ã©trange Ã©tiquetage des bagages â€œpour raisons de sÃ©curitÃ©â€, enfin avec la tournure gÃ©nÃ©rale que les choses avaient prise, avec cette ambiance pseudo-ludique, mais en rÃ©alitÃ© dâ€™une normativitÃ© quasi fasciste, qui avait peu Ã  peu infectÃ© les moindres recoins de la vie quotidienne.*â€‰

`Is a translation meant for readers who do not understand the original? This would seem to explain adequately the divergence of their standing in the realm of art.`

Was he responsible for this world? To a certain extent yes, he belonged to the state apparatus, yet he did not like this world. And Bruno, he knew, would also have felt uncomfortable with these creative burgers, these zen spaces where you could have your neck massaged during the trip while listening to birdsong, this strange baggage labeling â€œfor security reasonsâ€, finally with the general turn that things had taken, with this pseudo-ludic atmosphere, but in reality of an almost fascist normativity, which had gradually infected the smallest corners of life daily.

![Too busy allocating my own seed to own/operate anything rn](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/UHbumQiAMmxXI-kka5dyD.png?height=470&width=836)

Purely computer-generated writing, in which there is no apparent physical â€œactâ€ of writing, poses a further problem for this schema. I argue that this kind of writing can be understood as a â€œcomplex assemblage of partsâ€ like the Oracle of Delphi that *produces* automatic writing. The computer itself acts as the medium in this assemblage, called into service to produce oracular texts in ritual systems (like the *I Magma* app), designed and constructed by magiciansâ€”in this case, the artists and programmers responsible for the app.[\[13\]](https://www.serpentinegalleries.org/art-and-ideas/the-umbra-of-an-imago-writing-under-control-of-machine-learning/#reference-thirteen)

[https://twitter.com/FruhtRod/status/1543333058086146049](https://twitter.com/FruhtRod/status/1543333058086146049)

![write petrarcan sonnets using quotations (equally weighed) of Richard Brautigan, Kanye West and Julio Cortazarremove the quotation marks
remove the authors names](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Nd5P8P9gOMpGE2YEUNwPa.png?height=969&width=780)

2

I'm not a poet 
 I'm a writer who writes poems 
 I'm not a poet who writes poems 
 I'm a writer who writes poems about poets 
 I'm not a poet who writes poems about writers 
 I'm a writer who writes poems about writers who write poems 
 I'm not a poet who writes poems about writers who write poems about poets 
 I'm a writer who writes poems about writers who write poems about writers who write poems 
 I'm not a poet who writes poems about writers who write poems about writers who write poems about poets 
 I'm a writer who writes poems about writers who write poems about writers who write poems about writers who write poems

body:

### Tell your own story. A lot of people don't know, for years I wrote a blog about trying to find love after divorce. That's where my early Twitter followers came from. Here's an example of a post from 2018, a story that still hurts...

title: Fracton Protocol Academyâ€”â€”hiBAYC
body:
The first two chapters of Fracton Protocol Acadamy introduced the fundraising process through Blind Box and BAYC fractions (Peopleâ€™s BAYC), which can be considered 1/1000 of a BAYC. However, since the ERC-1155 token is still indivisible, the liquidity issue for Blind Box and Peopleâ€™s BAYC still exists despite their contribution toward making blue-chip NFTs accessible for everyone. The lack of liquidity increases the difficulty of asset valuation, reducing the effectiveness of price discoveries through the â€œinvisible handsâ€. To solve this problem, Fracton has introduced hiBAYC, planning to launch hiBAYC trading pairs on Uniswap and other cooperative CEXs.

For ease of expression, we will use BAYC as our target NFT to be fractionalized. The following rules will apply to other NFT collections, such as CryptoPuns, Sandbox, and Otherdeed.

**What is hiBAYCï¼Ÿ**

hiBAYC is the BAYC fraction token in the ERC-20 standard. During the fundraising period, users can swap their Blind Boxes for hiBAYC at 1:1000. They can also convert their Peopleâ€™s BAYC to hiBAYC at the same rate after opening the Blind Boxes. That is to say, every hiBAYC token represents 1 in a million shares of a BAYC in Fractonâ€™s BAYC Vault.

**How to get hiBAYCï¼Ÿ**

First, users can use the Meta-Swap function on Fractonâ€™s official site to exchange their Blind Box or Peopleâ€™s BAYC for hiBAYC. In addition, taking into account the better liquidity, lower transaction costs, and smoother user experience of centralized exchanges compared to DEX, Fracton will also work with the top CEXs for certain fundraising rounds, with the CEXs acting as the agent to support the fundraising. Users can subscribe for hiBAYC on the centralized exchanges and trade on the hiBAYC trading pairs when launched.** 
 **

**Repurchase**

You might be concern about the inflation caused by failed fundraising round. In such a case, the ratio between the total supply of hiBAYC and the number of BAYCs in the Vault will no longer remain 1,000,000:1. hiBAYC will depreciate in value.

Fracton has also considered this matter and designed a repurchase system to tackle the hiBAYC inflation problem caused by any failed fundraising round. Fracton will use the ETH raised from the failed round to buy back the accrued hiBAYC, with the repurchase price being the total ETH raised/(the number of Blind Box minted \* 1000). Due to technical reasons, our v1 version cannot execute the repurchase automatically. The repurchase will be carried out by the core members of Fracton as a temporary solution. We will include a decentralized and automatic repurchase system in the upcoming v2 update.

**Transaction Fees**

For each on-chain transaction of hiBAYC, the contract will charge a 0.2% transaction fee. Due to limitations in the current development stage, our v1 version is unable to decentralize the use of the transaction fees. In the upcoming v2 version, the DAO governance proposal will utilize the transaction fees wisely. They will play a more critical role in the Fracton ecosystem, such as providing liquidity on Uniswap, rewarding early participants, or rewarding early fundraisers.

So far, we have covered the majority of the fundraising function of Fracton Protocol. Fracton created Blind Box and Peopleâ€™s BAYC - tokens in the ERC-1155 standard - to overcome the barriers to purchasing blue-chip NFTs for ordinary investors. To further tackle the issue of lack of liquidity and inefficient pricing, Fracton created hiBAYC - a token in the ERC-20 standard. Since we have introduced all the fractionalized elements in the Fracton system, in our next chapter, we will be explaining in detail Fractonâ€™s multi-standard decentralized exchange pool - Meta-Swap. This is a crucial component of Fracton Protocol, stay tuned!

** 
 **

**Next Chapterâ€”â€” Meta-Swap**

title: A Birdeye View Of Cypto Bridges
body:
## Preface

With the explosion of layer 1 chains post 2020 and the fast-paced demand for capital velocity across the chain by capital chasing incentives and opportunities, bridges are considered to be an essential utility.

A running inside joke is that centralised exchanges are the best bridges, which used to be somewhat true, but market demand for non-KYC solutions is thriving.

 
 Blockchains like Bitcoin network, Ethereum, Avalanche, Solana, while great at making consensus and all the things we love them for, they are very siloed networks. unaware of outside world data including that of other blockchains. 

Colloquially called the oracle problem, these siloed networks cannot talk to each other. send out messages and listen to them in a sufficiently trustless way. Bridging problem can be thought of this way too. 
 

## Some Data

Over [$12B](https://dune.com/eliasimos/Bridge-Away-(from-Ethereum)) in TVL across various bridges (ETH<->Chain) 

![TVL pulled from Dune analytics](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/X2CDtDoH_eCNTajycY7dz.PNG?height=402&width=1868)

A quick comparison on some attributes of popular bridges. 
 

![Attributes of popular bridges](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/cnR0u56c54EdHee_0lgOf.PNG?height=284&width=766)

## A case for connext

[Connext](https://www.connext.network/) with its underlying network - Noncustodial Xdomain Transfer Protocol(**NXTP**), has among lowest in the industry fees. 
 One key feature is it deals with native assets across all chains, which reduces the extra step to swap an intermediate bridge token that incurs slippage and additional LP fees. 
 

### About NXTP..

 
 This is first post of a series exploring why Connext with its underlying tech NXTP can be the  leading cross chain protocol for bridging assets and the bigger opportunity of xApps, cross chain apps built on top of NXTP.

My [Twitter](https://twitter.com/rektasaurus69) and [Discord](https://@rektmofo#4849).

title: 10 Useful Academic IELTS Reading Resources
body:
[ 
 The IELTS exam](https://specialistlanguagecourses.com/what-is-ielts/) is perhaps the most widely taken international English language test. Over 2.5 million people sit the test every year from around the world. [IELTS](https://specialistlanguagecourses.com/the-ielts-academic-test-an-overview/) is recognised by universities, companies, professional bodies such as the GMC and NMC, immigration authorities, and government institutions all around the world as a measure of English language ability.

# The IELTS Reading paper

The reading paper of the Academic IELTS test is a tough one. You have to read 3 academic texts taken from journals, reports and articles and answer 40 questions on them in 1 hour. The texts are long â€“ up to 2,000 words each. This means you have to develop the ability to understand the main points quickly, as well as the ability to find the answers to the questions without reading every single word.

# What you need to doâ€¦

1. **Develop your vocabulary**, especially of key IELTS topics such as work, education, social trends, mass media, travel and tourism, and the environment.
2. **Improve your understanding of complex English**, so you can quickly follow complicated ideas and arguments. You need to see how ideas are connected together â€“ within sentences, between sentences, and between paragraphs.
3. **Practice answering IELTS style questions** so you get used to them â€“ work on practice test papers, get tips from your teacher, or use the SLC resource library (if youâ€™re taking a course with us)

# As part, of this itâ€™s critical to READ!!

The best practice exercise to of all is to simply read. When you get used to reading articles from newspapers and magazines, you will have fewer problems with long articles in the test itself.

Practice reading quickly for understanding, then look for specific facts and figures of interest. Make notes as you go of new words and phrases.

As a starting point, we have compiled a list of 10 useful reading resources and websites which may help you practice your reading skills at home. They cover a very wide range of topics, so are very useful for the IELTS Test.

title: Succession Series-Premiere Recap: Roys on Deck
body:
*With season three of* [Succession](https://www.vulture.com/tv/succession/) *now in the books, Vulture is returning to where it all began with weekly recaps of season one. Rewatch along with us and check back every Sunday night for the next pair of episodes.*

â€œAre we ready to fuck or what?â€

This is how Kendall Roy (Jeremy Strong) opens a meeting in â€œCelebration,â€ the first episode of *Succession*. Before he arrives at this meeting, we see him psyching himself up in the back seat of a chauffeured sedan, listening to the Beasties Boysâ€™ â€œAn Open Letter to NYCâ€ as he punches at the passenger-side headrest like a speed bag. When he emerges from the car, he takes one drag from a cigarette before discarding it and strolling into the corporate headquarters of Waystar Royco, a family business of immense global reach. His confidence is conspicuous and weirdly contrived, as if heâ€™s impressing some invisible cameras following him around â€” or, perhaps more accurately, trying to suppress the insecurity that burbles just below the surface.

Kendall can open a meeting with â€œAre we ready to fuck or what?â€ for two reasons: One, heâ€™s the No. 1 son of the companyâ€™s CEO, Logan Roy (Brian Cox), and nobody will tell him â€œno.â€ Two, he imagines himself as a cool executive, not the crusty old head of a lumbering media firm, but a hip dude who can see the future and speak in the brash lingo of the younger, more desirable demographic. Today, he feels heâ€™s going to need that language to speak to Lawrence (Rob Yang), the *actually* cool head of a *Vice*- or Buzzfeed-like digital entity called Vaulter, which has opened itself up to corporate backing. â€œI think Vaulter is the shizz,â€ says Kendall, unaware that time has elapsed on â€œshizzâ€ as a popular slang term and, more damningly still, unaware of how cringeworthy a word like that would sound coming out of his mouth. After all, his chauffeur just called him â€œthe manâ€ downstairs.

Kendall is also a species of human thatâ€™s always been around but seized the spotlight during the Trump administration: the failson. Later, weâ€™ll meet Loganâ€™s other two failsons, Roman (Kieran Culkin) and Connor (Alan Ruck), and his faildaughter, Shiv (Sarah Snook), most of whom will be vying for the CEO spot at Waystar, but none of whom would be qualified for an entry-level position at any other firm. Lawrence knows this well, and heâ€™s the only one in the room with the freedom to speak his mind, which he does so deliciously. He tells Kendall that heâ€™s not going to let â€œyou Neanderthalsâ€ raid the company, and he reminds him that he built an exciting new media brand from scratch while Kendall was etching track marks on his arms. It isnâ€™t often that outsiders have the access to odious billionaires to tell them what they really think, and Lawrence takes advantage.

The lesson of â€œCelebrationâ€ is that it doesnâ€™t matter: When you have that much money and power, anything is possible â€” at least, on matters where your soul isnâ€™t at stake. Because the other lesson of â€œCelebrationâ€ is that money doesnâ€™t buy happiness, especially in a family like the Roys, where the greed is corrosive and business rivalries poison every relationship. This is one reason why they are immediately so much fun to watch, especially in an immensely confident first episode where the showâ€™s creator, Jesse Armstrong, gives them so many colorfully nasty things to say.

In the opening scene of the episode, the King Lear of this scenario, Logan, stumbles out of bed and, in a state of exhaustion and disorientation, urinates in the closet. It is a sign that the golden lion of Waystar may finally have to retire, and we meet his child-successors in short order after that: Kendall at his Vaulter meeting, desperate to secure any deal, no matter how terrible, to impress his dad; Roman, a shit-talker who failed in his executive tutelage under 30-year company veteran Frank (Peter Friedman) in L.A., but can still swoop in at any time; Shiv, whoâ€™s dabbling in political consulting while her fiancÃ© Tom (Matthew Macfadyen) tries to ingratiate himself to his future father-in-law; and Connor, who is the firstborn but seemingly content in his life as a rich, eccentric layabout. Not exactly a sterling list of candidates.

Loganâ€™s â€œsurpriseâ€ birthday party also yields a potential wild card in the mix: Cousin Greg (Nicholas Braun), a lanky, amiable doofus who loses his latest job at Waystar after puking through the eyeholes of a mascot costume at one of the companyâ€™s amusement parks. At his motherâ€™s encouragement, Greg cleans up and squeezes his way into the party, with the hope that his great-uncle Logan, a man estranged from Gregâ€™s grandfather, will make a call and put him back on the management track. It doesnâ€™t matter to Greg that Logan calls him â€œCousin Craigâ€ â€” he answers to both names.

The distance between the Roys and the lives of ordinary human beings becomes clearest in a family softball game that seems like something the Kennedys might have done on the compound â€” on a modest, helicopter-accessible field, with catering and a customized scoreboard. When the Vaulter deal takes Kendall out of the game, Roman summons a boy of clearly humble stock to pick up a bat and raises the stakes by offering him a million dollars if he hits a home run. The boy is tagged out at third base, and Roman, in a show of such flagrant monstrousness that even his father is embarrassed, rips the million-dollar check up in front of him. He gives the boy a piece as a joke: â€œTake this back to your life. Itâ€™s a quarter-million.â€

What happens next is part of a subtle running theme of the episode. A company man quietly approaches the boyâ€™s parents with a nondisclosure agreement and surely a money offering of some kind to keep Romanâ€™s behavior from leaking to the press. Heâ€™s cleaning up after them. Earlier in the hour, director Adam McKay makes certain the viewers see a housekeeper scrubbing the spot on the rug where Logan urinated, and we suspect that Kendallâ€™s violent temper tantrum in a bathroom will be part of the job later. The Roys always have someone cleaning up their messes. And theyâ€™ll never know who that person is.

title: Infinite Games and permanent Revolution
body:
![Prepare to meet the Doom](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/U-4UgdOSZ9riklGV1RuLI.jpeg?height=821&width=1461)

[Such picture of reality looks hopeless](https://mirror.xyz/radioevrazia.eth/FEm-ufDgAWgo0S7XSm2mi6QyKE_0QPIuWGMlXELIjZk). As far as there is no lawful place for human freedom here. The pole of oncologic decay/differentiation is spectral/ghostly pole. Differentiation of being/existence/reality makes itself felt as something ephemeral. As fault/defect inside machinery of Formative Power. But of cause, any system strives to correct/repairer faults/defects. Rate of differentiation leveling by regeneration speed. On the one hand.

But on the other hand, that is game without end. And that is reason for optimism. As far as neither less nor win in that game is impossible. As consider comrade D. the Capital is increasing itself permanently. And therefore political/economic formations will blossom with cancerous areas of ontological decay infinitely. Control, compulsion an Formative Power will put out itself of action again. As said D., it is the sole possible Permanent Revolution that we have.

But I think otherwise. I think that we can make an end of the game. Human political history is sequence of wars, revolutions and incidents of genocide. That is history of stru9ggle for control of resources and means of material productions. As Nietzsche wrote, that is the Eternal Return of One and the Same. Depreciation of one values always cause establishment of other values. Abolition of exploitation always cause new form of exploitation. Values of aristocratic lifestyle guarantees serfdom or slavery. Proletarian State guarantees persecution and exploitation of counter-revolutionary classes. And as a whole value of human life guarantees of exploitation of animal and other non-human objects.

Nietzsche an Heidegger declared that they reached bounds of nihilism when they discovered that question of values is question of conditions, which make possibility of exploitation. But they could not imagine conditions which make impossibility of exploitation. And they took history of European mankind for a history of Being itself. And they took history of European mankind for a history of being itself. And overlooked many interesting things.

But of course history of the plant is not history of mankind. Moreover history of mankind is not human history only. As far as all substantial transformations which happened/happens to mankind are result of human interactions with non-human objects. For example language as system of graphic symbols for the duration of human history acts in the role of such radical object. But how appeared first symbols? I think that it is result of psychedelic plant poisoning. After that embryonic cells of language began to grow and develop on the human substratum. And human substratum began to change. In this way so called human consciousness was formed. And so-called human culture as well. Human existence failed in matrix of language and symbols.
At all events every human being is element of many large compound objects. If not ones then the others. And I mean not only semantic systems of symbols but also economic political ecological and technological systems. As McLuhan wrote rational human subject of European philosophy (with free will and other attributes) was formed by book printing technology. Totalitarian states of 20th century were possible owing to broadcasting technology.

I think that within cancerous areas of techno capitalistic hyper health one day something with ripen. Something that will able to transform structure of all economic and political formations on this planet. New radical object that will route us out the ring road of the Eternal Return.

I see outline of such radical object in architecture of decentralized networks/ecosystems. As Marx wrote, communism is idea of unlimited/unbounded access to means of production, for all people. In order to realize this idea, means of production must be out of any human power, control and property. Political realization of Marxist egalitarianism was impossible in the time of Marx when technological conditions decayed centralization of all human relations and non-human connections. But we see that at present architecture of blockchain is able to put some production process out of the limits of any human power/control. Network infrastructure that in this way works outside the formative space of States and Corporations already exist. Cryptocurrency NFT. That is just beginning.

Institution of property with regard to menâ€™s of production is necessary to economic exploitation. Exploitation and compulsion o=is necessary to Nietzscheâ€™s estimation /valuation and Heideggerâ€™s metaphysics (as production of delusions in the capacity of truths and as expense of nihilism). Therefore we are able to leave the ring road of Eternal Return only by means of abolition/destruction of this institution.
But institution of property itself is none other than technological possibility of various restrictive practices in regard to human access to objects. In the first place that is product of complex network which include many human and non-human objects. Of complex network that permit to hold stolen goods. As far as any property is theft. In this way the question of property with regard to means of production must be solved by means of technology. By means of alternative network construction. Construction of decentralized infrastructure/ecosystem. The central figure in such systems will be smart contract. Not a human subject. And because of that such systems will be absolutely inclusive.

As is well known all egalitarian political projects of  social reorganization turned into one or other embodiment of so called conspiracy of equal people in terms of Badiou. In theory such political solutions always were grounded by means of discourse which accentuated disproportion between human population size of natural resources on the planet. The tragedy of the Commines and so forth.

At all events subjects of accomplished in history social/political revolutions preferred equality within the limits of sole isolated human population (community) to continuation of equalizing/leveling social/political process on scale of the whole world/mankind. They acted in accordance with scheme which was described by Nietzsche. With scheme of estimation as realization of Will to Power. Value of civic rights guarantees existence of persons without civic rights. Value of equal peopleâ€™s community consists in the existence of persons outside the community. From idea of Worldwide Revolution to construction of socialism in the sole isolated country. History of revolutions is history of betrayals of egalitarian ideals. Instead of destruction of values itself revolutionaries established new values. But any new values is new inequality and new exploitation.
As think this means impossibility in regard to realization of extra egalitarian social project within the limits of political field. As far as such phenomena as political field and society itself are constructed by means of technological  networks and metric systems. But conception of unlimited inclusion (in accordance with idea of permanent increase of revolutionary class basis) already began to realize itself under the guise of construction of decentralized ecosystems. As far as including of these ecosystems is impossible to restrict at will of one or other quasi-human being.

> ## permanent revolution will be mint in permawed

[https://twitter.com/radioevrazia/status/1449338156558524417?s=20&t=EjvQ5sz7KWzX5Fjh69FpHA](https://twitter.com/radioevrazia/status/1449338156558524417?s=20&t=EjvQ5sz7KWzX5Fjh69FpHA)

 
 The infinite Game and the Eternal Return ends here. And the Permanent Revolution of Trotskism began. Professor of Oxford University Malcolm Bull well enough articulated thought about undercover complicity between extra egalitarian ideas and destruction of values in his work/book Anti-Nietzsche (2016). As wrote Bull extra egalitarian distribution of good must label/reduce/decrease/abolish/destroy common notions about values of these goods. In this way Bull postulated that unlimited inclusion will route mankind out the ring road of the eternal return on the way to desert which will destroy all human values. I share bullâ€™s opinion partly. But there is one problem. This idea bears no relation to present-day construction of inclusive society by earns of culture and politics on the West. As far as this phenomenon turned into cancel culture and so on.

Please understand me rightly. I hate sexism. I hate xenophobia. But also I hate any repressive social practice. The eternal return of Nietzsche is the Eternal Return of repressive practices and hierarchy of values which serves for justification of these practices. As wrote Bull, there is no humanistic answer to Nietzscheâ€™s philosophy of the Eternal Return/ the Will to Power. That is true. Moreover I think that any humanistic answers are delusional. As dark as human beings does not exist out of non-human folds which human behavior consciousness and culture. But I think that there is valid non-humanistic / non-human answer to the Eternal Return. That is smart contract and decentralized ecosystems (network). That is engineering of decay which subvert the basis of Formation Power, State Control and Economic Exploitation.  And itâ€™s only just beginning.

title: New Meta
body:
## Something changedâ€¦ can you see it, too?

I donâ€™t think it could be any more obvious that theres â€œ*something going on*â€. Not in a normal way, not in a Trump way, not in a â€œ*vibe shift*â€ way or whatever else people normally talk about when thereâ€™s â€œ*something going on*â€.

Can you see it, too?

You feel it, donâ€™t you?

Something has changed in a very, very, **VERY** real way. While I attribute this to some metaphysical nonsense much larger than any one person or group of people, I am a schizophrenic child and not smart.

## Whatâ€™s Happening?

Whatâ€™s happening? Do you know?

### The rules donâ€™t exist anymore.

**NOT** in an angst-fueled Iron Front LARP book club occupying wallstreet way. **NOT** anarchy, **NOT** some fork of anarchy and **NOT** just getting away with thing because thereâ€™s a subsitute teacherâ€¦ 

Actually, it feels similar to the last one.

### Try this at home:

Nothing can stop you right now. Do and say things that you normally wouldnâ€™t due to social norms. See how far you can get in any and all circles by not caring about status, superficial standards, background, occupation, blah blah you get it. You will get **ABSURDLY** far **as long as you respect authority that ought to be respected** (this is a must for infinite reasons that ought to be self-explanitory). There is no longer a rigid social structure for anything. Any circle will let you in as long as you are violently honest and even more violently yourself. 

If you are nice to people, you have a **HUGE** advantage. Supply and demand applies here. There is an extreme kindness shortage. There is an honesty drought. 

Donâ€™t fake being nice itâ€™s disgusting, donâ€™t change yourself so you can feel â€œ*safe*â€ (drink bleach if you do this ever for any reason) being a fake version of yourself. Then you are just a clay person. Papier-mÃ¢chÃ© man. Thatâ€™s who you are. Just a clay man - a soggy clay man - a sad, soggy, silly papier-mÃ¢chÃ© clay man that will rightfully amount to nothing. You are nothing. You are my clay. I mold you into funny shapes and put you on my snapchat story so girls think I do arts and crafts. Girls love guys that do arts and crafts (not you. You are a sad, soggy, silly papier-mÃ¢chÃ© clay man. MY sad, soggy, silly papier-mÃ¢chÃ© clay man).

### Black Sun Rising Â· Death In June, Boyd Rice

Song by a band I like collaborating with a guy I like with some lyrics I like:

[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=twdlZLOD760&list=OLAK5uy_keDhUw4tHDnkJL48bH-0Hq0IWq0KmGKyQ&index=2](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=twdlZLOD760&list=OLAK5uy_keDhUw4tHDnkJL48bH-0Hq0IWq0KmGKyQ&index=2)

[https://genius.com/Death-in-june-and-boyd-rice-black-sun-rising-lyrics](https://genius.com/Death-in-june-and-boyd-rice-black-sun-rising-lyrics)

> *The stones of a house 
 Come to life 
 And kill those inside 
 Statues of bronze 
 Begin to breathe 
 Black sun rise 
  
 A world is born 
 Another dies 
 Black sun rise 
 Decaying flesh 
 Gives birth to flies 
 Black sun rise 
  
 Demons and angels 
 Before our eyes 
 Black sun rise 
  
 Black sun gleaming 
 Black sun dreaming 
 Black sun rise 
  
 Columns tumble 
 Faiths all crumble 
 Black sun rise 
  
 Black run raises 
 Black sun blazes 
 Black sun rise*

^This is real and happening

## So what does this have to do with Milady?

Yea bro what are these â€œMy Ladyâ€ NFTs?

### This is the forefront of all of this.

YOU CAN MASK OFF WITH A CUTE AUTISTIC ANIME GIRL PFP ON TWITTER AND AN ARMY OF SCHIZOPHRENICS (ACTUAL SCHIZOPHRENICS) WILL BACK YOU UP. NO MATTER WHAT IT IS. YOU CANâ€™T LOSE IF THIS DOESNâ€™T DIE (it will not).

### The Charlie â€œâ€œâ€œProblemâ€â€â€

Charlotte Fang was exposed as an actually horrible human being (objectively) and while some people (Remilia included) have been denying this for some reason, it just brought back hating e-girls. (I am trying SOOO HARD to keep the e-girl hate alive but Charlie is most likely gonna back down from it because everyone smart around him is telling him heâ€™s gonna get in trouble.)

Charlie might get in some trouble but itâ€™s just with retards that donâ€™t matter. The largest thing that is happening right now (that can be called a singular â€œthingâ€) is everyone just not really caring outside of people who will capitulate into buying a Milady anyways. If Remilia turns into a fashion thing instead of Milady (which is pretty likely) Charlie has done nothing other than:

* built a brand around being a genius culture wizard
* shown that people will just capitulate to him if they wait 7+ days
* add infinite value to anything he touches for the Warhol level objectively bad stuff that nobody worth 5 minutes of anyoneâ€™s time / random twitter influencers and youtubers will talk about constantly which is just free advertising.
* started a new punk rock movement

This motherfucker is actually going to get away with everything and you can too. This is not a problem. This is a sign that you are going to be judged for your value add to things, not interpersonal drama. So add value to things. Do not worry about drama.

title: Bank for International Settlements to allow banks to keep 1% of reserves in Bitcoin
body:
Despite its skeptical approach to digital currencies, exacerbated by the recent [cryptocurrency market](https://finbold.com/category/cryptocurrency-news/) crash, it looks like the Bank for International Settlements (BIS) intends to extend its hand to the new asset class by allowing banks to hold up to 1% of reserves in cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin ([BTC](https://finbold.com/topic/bitcoin/)).

Indeed, BISâ€™s Basel Committee on Banking Supervision (BCBS) has made the proposal for limiting the banksâ€™ total exposures to â€œGroup 2 cryptossets to 1% of Tier 1 capitalâ€ in its consultative document titled â€œ[Second consultation on the prudential treatment of cryptoassets](https://www.bis.org/bcbs/publ/d533.pdf),â€ published on June 30.

## Group 1 vs. Group 2 assets

Specifically, Group 2 refers to the assets that do not meet classification conditions and includes specific tokenized traditional assets and stablecoins, as well as unbacked crypto assets. As opposed to Group 2, Group 1 includes tokenized traditional assets and stablecoins that meet classification conditions.

*Group 1 vs. Group 2 assets. Source: Bank of International Settlements*

According to the document:

> â€œBanksâ€™ exposures to Group 2 cryptoassets will be subject to an exposure limit. Banks must apply the exposure limit to their aggregate exposures to Group 2 cryptoassets, including both direct holdings (cash and derivatives) and indirect holding (ie those via investment funds, ETF/ETN, special purpose vehicles).â€

### Related

[U.S. 2nd-largest electric power company reportedly explores Bitcoin mining](https://finbold.com/u-s-2nd-largest-electric-power-company-reportedly-explores-bitcoin-mining/?related_post)[IMF says cryptocurrencies, CBDCs can be more efficient payment options than current ones](https://finbold.com/imf-says-cryptocurrencies-cbdcs-can-be-more-efficient-payment-options-than-current-ones/?related_post)[Mexican senator proposes bill to make Bitcoin legal tender](https://finbold.com/mexican-senator-proposes-bill-to-make-bitcoin-legal-tender/?related_post)

title: The 3-Step Method for Discovering Truth About The Universe and Ourselves, Applied to Personal Wealth Management and Investing
body:
It is called the Trivium Method. It was used and taught by the ancient Greeks, but probably discovered much earlier. 

You probably use it in your daily life, but have never explicitly defined it or heard somebody else define it.

The three steps are \[Input â†’ Processing â†’ Output\]. Also called \[Grammar â†’ Logic â†’ Rhetoric\] or \[Knowledge â†’ Understanding â†’ Wisdom\]. These are just different ways of labeling the same process.

Essentially, these are the steps a conscious entity has to go through in order to answer any question about the objective world and to create a more accurate picture of reality. 

1 â†’ The first step entails the gathering of raw data.

2 â†’ The second step involves the analysis of the data. Active Thinking. Weeding out falsehoods by discovering contradictions.

3 â†’ The third step involves applying the results from the second step to the real world.

For a better result, the method has to be reapplied to the new data generated by the third step.

\[1 â†’ 2 â†’ 3\] **â†’** \[1 â†’ 2 â†’ 3\] **â†’** \[1 â†’ 2 â†’ 3\] **â†’** \[1 â†’ 2 â†’ 3\] **â†’** \[1 â†’ 2 â†’ 3\] **â†’** â€¦

The Quality of the discovered Truth will depend on how many times you applied the method to a specific question. 

Ok, thatâ€™s the Method. Now letâ€™s apply it to personal wealth management and investing. 

1. Gather Information. Here we want to be as broad and inclusive as possible and use a diverse set of sources. Here are some important topics to consider:
   1. World Politics 
   2. Stock Market
   3. Crypto Market 
      1. Coins
      2. DApps and Protocols
   4. NFT Market 
   5. Tech/Scientific Advancements/Discoveries
   6. Big Industries
   7. Country Economics
2. Analyze the data and create a Spreadsheet of your financial portfolio. You could have different charts for different markets, but ideally, itâ€™s all in one place, easy to retrieve and update. You should update your portfolio regularly. Your portfolio might have different asset categories, like 
   1. Cryptocurrencies
   2. Stocks
   3. Fiat Currencies
   4. NFTs
   5. LP Tokens
3. Execute trades. After crystallizing your thoughts into a concrete portfolio spreadsheet, it is time to trade assets and execute smart contracts in order to put your money where your mouth is. You might need to
   1. Trade
   2. Buy
   3. Hold
   4. Invest
   5. Lend
   6. Borrow
   7. Provide Liquidity

Concrete Market Analysis, my Personal Spreadsheet, and efficient execution strategies/tools to follow.

Follow me on Twitter for more frequent tips.

Subscribe to my newsletter to receive concise and useful knowledge pieces like this straight to your inbox.

title: Darkness and Alienation
body:
## Prologue to object oriented political economy of the future / Mantrovâ€™s letter from the russian prison

### Preface

In my previous works, which by some lucky chance appeared on the web in last year (f.e. letter #3 from Squared Paper Notebook or my note about Revolution Populi). I stated very unusual thoughts about Flat Economic Systems and cryptocurrencies market. I tried to interpret these phenomena from position of Marxism and object oriented philosophy. Lately I thought that stated thoughts need a detailed commentaries and some corrections. My distance communications with Stefanie, who translated my note about Revolution Populi into German caused this idea in so far as Stefanie. encountered with some difficulties of understanding in the process of translation. But commencing upon certain places from this works, I broached a number of matters because in its absence valuable understanding of my works remained owing the impossibility. So from Fiat Economic Systems and cryptocurrencies market I crossed to description of object oriented ontological model, within the framework of which I was interpreting such phenomena as Power, Money, Metaphysics and production of alienation underÂ  capitalism. I formed the opinion that understanding of these phenomena needs the conception of plural Time. Considerable part of this text was given for it.And, after all I tried as clearly as possible articulate thoughts about unavoidable interruptions in Russian prison.

### Formative power in the Dark Universe of objects.

You can remember that in my some previous works descripted confrontation (and undercover complicity) of Fiat Economic Systems with cryptocurrencies market as confrontation (and undercover complicity) between two forces of opposite ontological sides. It looks like very big and not well grounded words. Even with reserve that the question is particular pattern of Ontological Decay in regard to integrity of political and economic formations.

From position of plane ontology and taxonomy in regard of beings/things/objects are groundless. But narration about confrontation (and undercover complicity) of opposite ontological sides suspiciously looks like such taxonomy. Therefore I need to explain that it is nothing of the kind. For this task I must commit to paper my interpretation on phenomena of Formative Power and any economic / political supremacy in the light of object oriented ontology.

Object oriented ontology as is well known regards all of existent like set of discrete objects. Like set of ontological equivalent units of existence which reciprocally devoid of direct access to being-in-itself of each other. Object oriented anthology suppose what objects can come onto various types of relations and forms a new compound objects. But accentuating what isolated being-in-itself of objects never can exhausted by sum-total of its relations.

In this connection I suggest consider phenomenon of Formative Power in the light of compound objectsâ€™ forming. Compound objects, which grounded on such types of relations as exploitation, parasitism and obsession between separate objects/things/beings. Compound objects which appears not so much in space as in time. Which strives for self-conservation. And for expansion at the same time.

But for a store we will make an excursion into history of European philosophy.

### Frozen Becoming

As a whole in history of European philosophy Nietzsche and Heidegger very equivocal persons. But great importance of certain theirs conceptions is impossible not to admit. First of all I mean thesis about direct close relation between values (as metaphysics production of truths) and exploitation (as realization of will to Power). However theirs intuitions about strategy of Power inside the Time are of interest for us too. As Nietzsche wrote will to Power at highest manifestation strives â€œto imprint a traits of Being on stream of Becoming/Timeâ€.

I remember these words very often. May be, as far as live in Russia. And can feel as Power is imprinting a traits/features/outlines of soviet and imperial past on stream of Time/Becoming by experience. But I donâ€™t think that Formative Power on the national space is solely work of certain obscurantist people. As far as human beings doesnâ€™t exists in metaphysical vacuum (as thought Kant). Human beings always faded into non-human space. Non-human objects often keep human beings in certain lines. It forms human units and collectives in the capacity of subjects/actors. It is hardware. What do you want from ice desert from the middle of which installed tap flowing with Hydrocarbonic Putrid Money? No wonder that human beings, who once found selves at the tap will erect by all possible means a obstructive infrastructure , which can keep this state forever. Therefore in our part of the world time is never running.

### Complicity with darkness

Attentive to detail reader could notice in previous chapters some contradictions. On the one hand I said about existent as about set of discrete units, whose being-in-itself allays withdrawn from direct admission for other units, recalling Graham Harmanâ€™s thesis about reciprocal darkness of objects. But on the other hand I am asserting what human subjects are formed by process of material production. That is product of interactions with non-human beings/things/objects. And it looks like some inconsistency. But I am going to wind up this impression. By conception of compound objects production.

What I main problem of human beings? I think that main problem consists in the fact that human beings never have any possibility of direct admission not only to being-in-itself. I is evidently. Our being-in-itself is always clot of impenetrable darkness. We interact to it by language, which make thinking possible. But language itself is object of the outer world.

We perceive ours own bodies in the same capacity too. As objects, whose existence was given to us indirectly by means of sensory instrumental interface.

It is understandable that such state of things cause impossibility of any true knowledge for human beings. Both about ourselves and about the outer world. The only possible move in regard knowledge of ourselves and other units of existent is interaction with these units. Interaction which cause production of new compound objects. For example, right now I participate in forming of new compound object enjoying equal rights participate as well: language by means of that I am thinking squared paper notebook and fountain pen by earns of those I am recording thoughts, some books from my bedside table, which I am quoting and the prison camp where I am serving my sentence. I never understand neither myself nor the outer world of dark discrete objects. But interacting with it I can participate in extraction of new compound objects and types of complicities which never can exhaust this darkness.

I think that it is the basis of not only human knowledge/cognition, but also of biological evolution. Extraction of complicities from darkness. Movement from the one unknown to the other into space of contingency. And I think that Marx meant just such activity in the field of human existence by name of Unalienated Labor. From time to time this phenomenon can show itself in fields of science, art and policy.

But if Marx considered unalienated labor as primordial modules of human existence, I donâ€™t think that this thought is well grounded. Human beings for the most part of oneâ€™s own history were oppressed by big compound objects that holds their phenomenological situation of human and non-human beings on big compound objects. On existence in the capacity of its components. Thatâ€™s mechanics of powerful interactions. Of course, not all compound objects grounded on powerful interactions. But just it is ground of such types of relations as exploitation parasitism and obsession, which always play important part in the Human History. As far as blind intuition of biological survival always keep up such types of relations. In spite of the fact that in this way survival sooner or later appear itself as impossibility of living the Life, as Reza Negarestani wrote.

Whatever happens that ecosystems (as big compound objects), which appeared in contingent way, often strives to close itself for contingent complicity with Plural Darkness of Being. This problem is basis of narration within some chapters of Negarestaniâ€™s â€œCyclonopediaâ€. Referring the refer to Polish philosopher Roman Ingarden, Negarestani articulate that Ciosing (Cioture) is priority for Open Systems and niches as areas of Power projections, which suppress undesirable interactions and communications. Openness of niche opens it in order that do it closed. And close it in order that do it open.

Human formations always exist in the middle of these contingent complicities of plural darkness with plural darkness. Because naÃ¯ve anthropocentric escapism in the shape of striving for conservation of safety condition in the middle of this space only can alienate system from functional understanding of the environment. Thus striving for safety and surplus control turns out only opposite results. Just keep up the current affaires of global policy. In this way I think what radical eco-oriented thinking must give up completely value of safety as conception.

### Plural Time and Cyclic Production

I must elaborate on one more conception, which I used above. When I am talking about stream of Time/Becoming, someone would think that I am talking about kind of continuum. But it is not right. My understanding of Time corresponds to antichloristic thinking of object oriented philosophy. In this way Time must be understood as measure of interactions between isolated objects. But as far as not all objects interacts with each other (quite the contrary most of objects just can not detect one another), in place of one interobjective scale we must tell about a great number of discrete scales. In this way production of new compound objects must caused production of new interobjective temporal dimensions. Especially if we tell about compound objects, which use mechanics of powerful interactions. That is such types of relations as exploitation, parasitism and obsession. In this regard tell that teleology of Power is complete stasis, is not quite right.

Of course, on the one hand, complete stasis as substitute of immortality is obsession of many Authoritarian Formations. But on other hand, complete of many Authoritarian Formations. But on other hand, complete stasis is impossible ideal. Nothing happens once and for all. In real life formations forced to reproduce itself. Permanent reproduce by means of technology, by means of economic force, by means of discourse and by means of violence. As we tell about any political and economic supremacy we must understand this phenomena in the light of transformation of many temporal currents into one general quasi-continuum of Production Cycles. This mechanics is simple. The more you are involved in reproduction elements, the less you have time for any other complicities. In this way existence of many objects become alienated on behalf of one compound construction. But just how existential alienation holds a phenomenologic situation of objects within temporal limits of Cyclic Production? I think Â  that matter must be researched in the light of Latourâ€™s Actor Network Theory. That allow us to consider such phenomena as Formative Power and Alienation under Capitalism as product of complex network running/functioning. Of network, which consist of many (certain) human and non-human actors. Of network, which able to reorganize itself. And which able to break itself. What remained of Power after such deconstruction apart from blind intuition of survival and fear of the Life?

### Factory of delusions

Of course, this task needs a some other circumstances than I have in prison. But nevertheless I shall try to state some my thoughts here. Letâ€™s return to Nietzsche, he discovered direct connection between will to power and establishment of values. View on the values is view on the Symptom of Power on the side of those who establish a values. That is general Nietzscheâ€™s thesis in this regard. As he wrote, possibility of Valuation direct depend on possibility of exploitation within human population. Accordingly he consider egalitarian political movements (which struggle against exploitation) as motive force of Nihilism. It is understandable. Value of aristocratic lifestyle guarantees existence of serfdom. Value of free citizenâ€™s lifestyle in the ancient Greece guarantees existence of Slavery. Values of one manâ€™s life guarantees depreciation of other Nietzsche (in political sense) is more right than Adolf Hitler, Donald Trump and

But what is act of Valuation itself? Nietzsche connected it with fields of Art and Aesthetics. He considered the Art as the most clear expression of Will to Power and Establishment of Values. But nonetheless such conceptions as will to Power and Art within his works remained a kind of thing-in-itself Heidegger attempted to clarify these Nietzscheâ€™s conceptions. He placed it in the context of relations between delusions and truth. In the context of epistemology. I think that this Heideggerâ€™s gesture must be interpreted in the way of object oriented philosophy.

Heidegger took thesis about fundamental gap between true world (which completely inaccessible for all beings/objects) and apparent world (as space of perceptible objects) as a starting point proceeding from that Heidegger postulated imperative value of delusions as truth/verity substitutes. Human beings are doomed to produce delusions by means of forming and transformation of appearances. In the opinion of Heidegger, that is essence of the Art (as realization of will to power). And also that is essence of the Valuation. The Valuation is instrument of Power. By means of that Power â€œimprint traits/features o Being on stream of Time/Becoming.â€

But Heidegger correlate Valuation not only with Art, but also with Metaphysics. How we should understand thought about direct connection between Metaphysics, Valuation and will to power in the light of object oriented philosophy? Letâ€™s take as a starting point Nietzscheâ€™s thesis that â€œView on the Valuesâ€ is â€œView on the conditions for rise and conservation of large formations within/inside stream of Time (Becoming)â€. What is a function of metaphysics at process of rise/conservation of large human formations? As I think it is instrument of viscosity. Teleology of metaphysics/ideology/discourse (under these names I mean any various kinds of production that makes delusions in the capacity of truths, taking into account that any discourse turns into metaphysics in proportion as it strives to from a hermetically sealed circle of references) is identical with teleology of economic exploitation and (non-economic) compulsion (by violence).As far as all of these instruments holds phenomenologic situations of objects/human beings within certain fixed limits in order to conservation of large economic/political formations as compound objects). This teleology is alienation of Life (as venture search of complicities with Unknown) from itself.

In contrast to Heidegger I donâ€™t think what making of delusions (in the capacity of truths have Imperative Value for human existence as such. Moreover I think that this thesis as such is fixing of certain delusion in the status of truth. In fact, we can not postulate about human being-in-itself something fixed. Apart from that human existence is finite, breakable and isolated from other beings/objects thing. That is darkness beyond any discourse. Of course from this darkness may be extracted various relations and compound objects which may be descripted in form of rough plans/diagrams/maps of reality. But these plans/diagrams/maps (by analogy with of paradigm in science history) is plans/diagrams/maps of certain configuration between objects. It must be destroyed in case of any reconfiguration. And fixing of some plans/diagrams/maps of reality in the capacity of invariable truth always serves for conservation of some economic and political formations. Therefore, production of delusions as truths (or truths as delusions) have Imperative value not for all human being but only for beneficiaries of certain (some) human configurations. But they also paysÂ  loss of phenomenologic mobility for that. Any social consciousness is consciousness of escapism as far as it does not destroy itself.

But social consciousness doesnâ€™t exist within vacuum. It Is a product and at the same time a function element of formative (re)production. As far as metaphysical production direct connected with such conceptions as necessity and conformity with (natural) laws that is ground of economic exploitation and compulsion is ground of discourse/metaphysical production. If all this instruments of viscosity effectively keep up each other human existence found itself inside hermetically sealed space of cyclic reproduction. There is no way out from here.

### Monetary metaphysics

When we talk about Values in the context of Nietzscheâ€™s philosophy it goes without saying what we talk about metaphysics ideology/discourse. But I think that concentrate oneâ€™s attention on discourse in case of Formative Power studies we fall into humanities/humanist delusion. We should mention one another field of human relations, which completely correspond to with metaphysics as essence of nihilism and nihilism as essence of metaphysics.

Ideological supporters of Fiat Economics often talks what cryptocurrencies market is â€œbig financial bubbleâ€, â€œglobal swindleâ€ and so forth. As far as in the opinion of them value cryptocurrencies is nothing guaranteed/ensured/supported in the real. of course it is not so in actual fact.Â  Value of cryptocurrencies is guaranteed/supported by demand for instrument that makes economic relations possible beyond limits of governmental and banking control. But that is not the point. The point is that we can move/transfer this critique back. Against Fiat Economics.

On what grounds Fiat Money have value? What is guarantee of that? It is just symptom of Power on the side of those who postulate (establish) this value in Nietzscheâ€™s terms, is not it? Of power as compulsion by means of laws and violence. Of power as product of complex network running/functioning. Of network which consist of many human and non-human actors. Fiat Economics not able to lines of barbed wire and other elements, which put together a machinery of Formative Violence.

Circulation of Fiat Money is grounded on governmental control of human economic relations, that is driven by force into space of Fiat Economic. But at the same time machinery of governmental is grounded on circulation of Fiat Money. That is network running/functioning which formed a circle. That is cyclic (re)production of Formative Power.

In the light of that phenomenon of cryptocurrency is of special interest. As infrastructure by means of that life can escape from complicity with industry of alienation, which guards present day political/economic formation against invasions of unalienated life. Phenomenon of cryptocurrency showed that fields of economic relation between people may be putted out from network, which produces control, exploitation and compulsion as Complex of Formative Power. This phenomenon shown subversive potential of technological decentralization that able to incapacitate ground and integrity of present day political/economic authorization formations. Therefore I think that we should interpret as pattern of machinery that turns large compound objects into multiplicity of many new discrete beings/ into plural Darkness as space of new complicities with Unknown.

### Hyperimmunity and dialectic of Decay

In my previous works I tried to interpret confrontation (and undercover complicity) between Fiat Economics and Cryptocurrency market as confrontation (and undercover complicity) between faces of opposing ontological sides. The pole of Decay/differentiation/Disintegration versus the Pole of Power/Integration/Capitalistic Supremacy. But lately my comrade D. in correspondence with S. expressed thought about defectiveness of this interpretation. As D. considers in the real all of us everyday have to do with only one independent ontological Pole. That is one planetary production network system which produces alienation. System which integrates all local formations and political/economic supremacies. That is Global Capitalism. As machinery that converts the earth (together with all human and non-human objects of that) into Added Value, State Control and Political Supremacy. The total sun of human history as ecological, economic and political phenomenon.

Comrade D. stated thought that formation decay is none other than side effect/result of striving for strengthening/reinforcement of Formative Power, state Control and Economic Exploitation. That is naÃ¯ve escapism of biological survival. Of survival that permanently forced to encounter with lack/shortage of oneâ€™s own existence s the heart of the oneâ€™s own nature that cant run away from this existential lack.

I was thinking about this dialectic a long time. And concluded that such dialectical interpretation indeed able to describe machinery of formation decay as well as possible. Moreover in the light of that interpretation my be described not only phenomenon formations. And history of science as well.

As far as Power is not only exploitation and compulsion but also permanent strengthening/reinforcement of compulsion and exploitation (as wrote Heidegger when he was commenting Nietzsche), Formative Power faces with the problem of technological reinforcement/updating/modernization as applied to oneâ€™s own machinery. There is economic reasons apart from anything else. All formations which grounded on exploitation faces with the prospect that is unavoidable exhaustion of exploitable resources. Money petroleum ozone layer and biological variety are dwindling. Substratum of survival turns into non-existence. By force of that formations strives for expansion of exploitation and increase of it effectiveness. By menâ€™s of technologies. In other words by means of activities that is extracting new compound objects/things/beings from interobjective darkness of the Unknown. In order to that formation must admit life (as complicity with the Unknown) inside oneâ€™s own formative space. Must looseÂ  work of viscosity and powerful interactions within cyclic reproduction of Formative Power.

But extraction/construction of new compound objects/beings is essentially a process with unpredictable consequences. Irrespective of tasks in order to which new compound objects are extracted/constructed, these objects find oneâ€™s own being-in-itself can form a new structures of complicities with human and human objects. That can cause faults/defects in cycles of Power, Control and Added Value. Faults and defects that can cause appearance/forming of local spaces with lowered viscosity, where objects can get the opportunity of temporary liberation from formative compulsion, exploitation and control. Of local spaces where formations body begin to decay. It disintegrates to multiplicity of new objects/beings/things.

Moreover, from time to time Formative Power tries to use extraction/construction of new compound objects in order to liquidation of consequences which caused by extraction/construction of compound objects in the past. Sometimes such reaction of system can completely disable (put out of action logic of cyclic reproduction itself. Can turn cyclic reproduction into spiral movement to darkness of the Unknown.

Such phenomenon as genesis of the internet I direct connected with striving of various science institutions for increase of effectiveness in regard to oneâ€™s own research work. By means of increase of information exchange. In point of facts, science institutions functions as instruments of the capital and formative power. Of ststaes (govermenents) and corporations. Instruments which for the most part serves needs of defense industry and economic/ecological exploitation. Just get acquainted with statistic about correlation of investment between applied and fundamental scientific research works and statistic about sources of this investment (that is adduced in Bruno Latourâ€™s work â€œscience in actionâ€) In spite of all these facts, just only because of science itself as optimal medium for development of decentralization that able to dissolve basis of any Formative power.

Onion routing is created in order to increase of security in the field of network communication for US Navy. MDMA is side product of scientific research works in the field of military psychostimulants in the third Reich. Lysergic acid diethylamide is created by accident inside the laboratory of large-scale pharmaceutical corporation. Owing to all this non-human objects we have phenomenon of present-day black market in the Deep Web.

Human beings can escape control , exploitation and compulsion only owing to side effects and side products of striving for strengthening/reinforcement of Formative Power, State Control and Economic Exploitation. Human freedom is symptom of immune hyperactivation within machinery of Formative Power.

Power of Romanovsâ€™ House in the Russian Empire tried to reinforce itself by means of conprecendeted privileges of nobility/gently. Power interpret this social class as oneâ€™s own ground. But that strategy of power turned out otherwise 19th century began to take shape just owing to this social class.

Just noblemanâ€™s organized Insurrection of Decembrist. Letâ€™s go on.

In the middle of 19th century the Russian Empire developed education. Including technical education, that was corresponding to needs of early capitalistic industry. But that caused many social alterations. Formation of new social classes/ for example class of intellectuals not of gentle birth that became a social basis of narodnik movement and various socialist organizations. Just activists of narodnik movement assassinated tsar Alexander on 1881. By means of bomb. Development of technical education was bearing fruits in the field of applied chemistry. In the way the peopleâ€™s will commenced traditions of revolutionary terrorism in the Russia. That is pattern of the Russian life and history. *Khokhloma*.

*2022Â January*

*Heartland of the Black Hole*

title: Cutting Through the Noise: Token Metrics To Keep An Eye On
body:
As we sit in a bear market - thereâ€™s increasing amounts of noise echoing from every direction - particularly on Twitter where sentiment has been chaotic to say the least. Itâ€™s become difficult to focus on fundamentals and easy to get carried away by the panic. Over the last few months weâ€™ve encountered a turning point in the macro-economic environment with decade-high inflation paired with the start of quantitative tightening (QT) which has led to risk-assets (such as technology stocks & crypto) to be out of favor. Mix that in with the UST de-peg/LUNA collapse along with cascading liquidations for the likes of Celsius & 3AC.

As someone whoâ€™s experiencing the rollercoaster of emotions from the heights of a crypto bull to a winter for the first time - keeping an eye on fundamental metrics has helped me focus on projects that generate revenue and have significant usage/adoption. At the end of the day, blockchains are not just currencies - and can be valued similar to traditional businesses as they generate cash flows through fees that are distributed to token-holders and supply side participants.

At its crux, crypto protocols:

* Provide a Service
* Charge a fee for the service
* Allocate fees between supply side participants & token-holders

The image below is a helpful representation of the above information for the likes of Bitcoin, Ethereum, Uniswap & Sushiswap

![Token Terminal](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/rDpYCm-Ui5qNGTxYbN2IM.png?height=356&width=1448)

Keeping this in mind, letâ€™s take a look at some Key Performance Indicators (KPIâ€™s) and how they apply to a specific sector/type of protocol within the DeFi landscape. Itâ€™s important to note that these metrics are not a holistic measures of performance. Macro-economic, technological and several other qualitative factors such as narrative and speculation can drive the price of these digital assets. However, these metrics can be a useful gauge to evaluate projects against each other in their respective sectors and based on the activities they facilitate.

## 1) Total Value Locked (TVL)

Sum of all assets deposited in the smart contract of the underlying protocol/blockchain. The calculation of TVL can differ from project to to project based on what services they facilitate whether its borrowing/lending, decentralized exchanges or trading. Since the operations of DeFi applications differ, the they might not be fully comparable through TVL and therefore the metric can be misleading. It does, however offer a standardized way of analyzing them.

![Top Dapps by TVL - Token Terminal](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/QFT8-8TLPd1vF0B6EGNvf.png?height=1134&width=2240)

As seen above - a mixture of DEXâ€™s and lending protocols make up most of the leaders in TVL. For a decentralized exchange (DEX) like Uniswap - that relies on an Automated Market Maker (AMM) model, the TVL is equal to the liquidity deposited by liquidity providers. More capital locked translates to lower slippage (i.e fluctuations in order prices).  However a better measure of its performance for a DEX like Uniswap would be through Trading Volume & Trading Fees Generated.

For a lending protocol like Compound TVL is calculated taking the difference between total assets deposited and total assets borrowed. A better way to look at the performance of a Lending protocol like Compound would be Borrowing Volume and Total Revenue or interest paid by borrowers.

Itâ€™s also important to understand whether the TVL generated is incentivized or non-incentivize as that can suggest how organic the demand for the protocol is.

## 2) Protocol Revenue

Protocol revenue is equal to the amount of revenue that is distributed to token-holders and the company behind the protocol. Can be thought of as profit margin/bottomline for a protocol to which revenue accrues to the token. Some protocols allocate cash flow to the token but like early stage and growth companies - several donâ€™t. For example: Uniswap does not allocate cash flows to UNI holders whereas SushiSwap does.

![SushiSwap Protocol Revenue - Token Terminal ](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/rP-gGpDZJWLzZH8sbnT6i.png?height=1276&width=2312)

As seen above - a portion (\~ 15-20%) of SushiSwapâ€™s total revenue is distributed to token-holders.

## Total Revenue and Supply-Side Revenue

Total revenue is equal to cumulative fees paid by the users over a specific time period. Supply side revenue is the portion of this that is paid to supply-side participants.

* For instance - In the case of an AMM (Automated Market Maker) such as Uniswap or Balancer - it could be the fees paid to Liquidity providers.

![UniSwap Total Revenue - Token Terminal](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/7opEPTMTTDdnBHZqT3vzA.png?height=1232&width=2306)

In the case of Uniswap - as seen above all of Uniswap's total revenue is distributed to its users. i.e: supply side participants providing liquidity to a pool.

## Sector Specific Metrics:

Metrics can only give the right perspective about a protocol when considered in with respect to itâ€™s underlying use case. Below are some metrics that are useful to compare protocols under the same category/sector.

### Decentralized Exchanges

* **Trading Volume**

The success of a Decentralized Exchange (DEX) can be gauged through the total volume it facilitates. Higher trading volumes can potentially translate to increased cash flow for protocol participants such as token-holders and liquidity providers.

![DEX Trading Volume - Token Terminal](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/dHeasPYQuRbmuxsBjZhAr.png?height=1222&width=2294)

Looking at the top DEX protocols by trading volume over the last 180 days it looks like Uniswap has the highest volume (does not accrue to token-holders) followed by dYdX.

### Lending/Borrowing:

* **Borrowing volume**

Borrowing volume is equal to the total value of outstanding loans of a lending protocol.

*Ex: Goldfinch Finance (GFI)*

![Goldfinch Borrowing Volume vs Market Cap- Token Terminal](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/GZtovr9A9FQ66V18xTbi-.png?height=1306&width=2324)

Goldfinch Finance - a decentralized credit protocol that unlocks crypto lending for the emerging market is seeing a large increase in borrowing volume. Itâ€™s market cap however has taken a tumble which can be viewed as a good opportunity when paired with the increasing revenue and TVL.

![Goldfinch Protocol Revenue - Dune ](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/eaLd_vrz8IOKSWMlpSjkW.png?height=688&width=1884)

### 

![Goldfinch TVL - Dune ](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/PvBJsxY-iV4F5zO6cvroj.png?height=752&width=1854)

There are several other DeFi protocols such as Asset Management & derivatives protocols bringing the world of financial structured-products into crypto. I plan to dive into those in a separate post. But for now, I hope this provides enough information to traverse the huge number of protocols and narrow down based on fundamental metrics like these.

## Conclusion

The crypto industry has come a long way in the past few years and the pace of development as left us with a diverse landscape of protocols. With an increasing number of them to consider, Iâ€™ve found it helpful to use fundamental metrics like these to separate real value from the hype. Re-emphasizing the fact that assets arenâ€™t priced based on solely fundamentals - a multitude of other factors come into play (macro, narrative, tech) which makes it crucial to make decisions holistically. An exciting property of blockchains are that applications built on them are public/open which means that we can access *real-time* (network, usage and financial information) sitting in our very bedrooms. This idea of open data makes me excited - as it can facilitate better, quicker decision making and deeply benefit stakeholders in the ecosystem by democratizing access to data.
