title: Great Ideas Are Born in Bear Markets, Challenge Accepted.
body:
Hello OUATO Earthlings,

Welcome to our first Mirror.xyz post! Moving forward, we will publish our official statements + project updates on this platform. (Sorry, Medium) Learn more about Mirror.xyz [HERE](https://dev.mirror.xyz/)

This post will be a long one because we have new exciting updates and developments that we're announcing, so I hope you have a cup of coffee with you.

Today's discussion will consist of the following topics:

* **I.** The Platform Dilemma **ÏŸ**
* **II.** Whatâ€™s Next? DAO?
* **III.** NFTs Coming Soonâ€¦ Burn Baby Burn!
* **IV.** Announcing Our First Record Release
* **V.** OUATO.net Music Royalty Protocol


---

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/HnXtXzLN529x0PuhcHREP.png?height=1500&width=3000&&&size=medium)

### I. The Platform Dilemma ÏŸ

The last two months went by fast, it feels like only yesterday the team and I were worried about not meeting our presale soft-cap. Since then, not only did we reach the hard cap, but we have fostered this community during one of the worst times in crypto. It is now **July 2022**, many of our presale investors have exited and the overall volume in crypto has dried up.

They say that the bear market is the best time to build and those who can weather the storm will come out stronger than ever. I see our current situation as an opportunity to truly focus on what will help us grow in the long run. Due to the nature of our token economy, the lack of volume results in limited development/marketing funds. The fear of a looming recession has also affected all of us whether we like to admit it. Especially with our project being on the BSC network, our target demographic has shrunk dramatically in the past couple of weeks.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/saeU_mG_AnUqvjZGf71cl.png?height=368&width=3000&&&size=large)

This creates a complex puzzle for us to solve since our platform requires users to engage and post content. Our main concern is releasing the beta at a time when crypto adaption is at its lowest. This would result in low traffic, therefore limiting our marketing funds which would threaten the longevity of the project. This does not mean that we are holding off on the beta launch but rather explaining the reason why we are extra cautious with the announcement of any concrete plans. We want to hear your thoughts on this, but we'll talk more about that later.

Our company and most importantly the leadership team have not made a single penny from the work we've done so far. The team's supply is still locked in Unicrypt's token vesting lockers and most if not all our private investors have held their supply. I have stated this before but [OUATO.net](http://OUATO.net) is my life's work. So far, I have spent every day of this year developing and strategizing my vision for the project, so don't expect us to throw in the towel any time soon.

Again, we are early, and this is just the beginning of a long journey.


---

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/aw_2Sse2zg2UHKYeH20K6.png?height=1500&width=3000&&&size=medium)

### II. Whatâ€™s Next? DAO?

In theory, our identity as a web3-based startup gives us a technical/financial advantage over traditional indie labels. It's in all our best interests that we continuously explore new tools and methods to better our systems and strategies. We've most recently deployed the staking contracts through Unicrypt to reward our long-term patrons, but the current market forces us to search for other ways to strengthen the community.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/FuTGTavBRZ0ob8lRDGQN7.png?height=568&width=3000&&&size=large)

Telegram and Discord are great for daily communication and announcements, but it falls short when needing to delegate. I've always dwelled on the idea of deploying [OUATO.net](http://OUATO.net) as a DAO but the risk of losing creative control as a creative agency was ultimately why I chose not. However, this doesn't mean we can't utilize the same tools as DAOs. After all, decisions that affect everyone should involve everyone in the process.

I am proud to share that we will experiment using decentralized voting systems. We will begin with limited topics for delegation, including our upcoming platform mechanisms and other future non-creative developments. Our members will be able to connect their wallets and validate their $OUATO tokens to vote on proposals as well as create new ones. Itâ€™s worth noting this will be our Beta stage and the community can ultimately vote whether we permanently integrate or dissolve the voting system. We will announce more details in the coming days. (Possibly a YouTube video?)

\**GASP\**

â˜Ÿ*Listen to this song while reading the next section* â†´

[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pG8TyIEAqps&ab_channel=TheTrammps-Topic](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pG8TyIEAqps&ab_channel=TheTrammps-Topic)


---

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/uq5dqUeFxWiSZyEgUjT2Q.png?height=1500&width=3000&&&size=medium)

### III. NFTs Coming Soonâ€¦ Burn Baby Burn!

Here's a big one. We are currently in the conceptual phase of creating our first NFT collection. Although we're still very early on this, it will bring some excitement and engagement to our community.

Most of the funds raised from this collection will go towards the buyback and burning of $OUATO tokens. Records of each tx from the 'purchasing of the tokens' to 'transferring to the dead wallet' will be publicly recorded on a database that will be shared with everyone. The minting cost will be kept relatively low for inclusivity and pieces will be dropped randomly to minimize scalpers.

**[OUATO.net](http://OUATO.net) NFT Royalties Splits**

â†³ `40%` - Buyback / Burn $OUATO

â†³ `30%` - Production Funds

â†³ `20%` - Platform Rewards Pool

â†³ `10%` - $OUATO LP

Other utilities may include holder-exclusive features on the OUATO.app platform. NFT exclusive staking pool with ETH rewards and more. Additional details will be revealed in the coming weeks.

BTW, this written post is also an NFT that can be minted. Proceeds from our Mirror.xyz NFTs will follow the same split schedules listed above. Scroll down for minting details.


---

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/4nQsAvS5Kd7HBjfXRWZ0H.png?height=1500&width=3000&&&size=medium)

### IV. Announcing Our First Record Release!

Okay, let's talk business.

I predicted that our main challenge would be cutting through the noise in an already flourishing web3 music scene. Besides the underlying tech that powers our project and community, it is crucial that the art speaks for itself. Our mission to produce and support artists/projects stays as the focal point of everything we do.

The question is, how do we convince artists to risk their work and collaborate with an experimental concept like ours? Especially during a bear market? Spotify pirated thousands of music during the early stage of its business to prove its concept to labels/artists. But as a web3 music start-up, proving our concept takes more than just releasing music. Quality music, cohesiveness to our brand, and most importantly finding an artist who embodies our values are all criteria to be met.

To start our music venture on the right foot, I am thrilled to announce that on July 26th, I will be releasing my first single '**BUGS R US**' through [OUATO.net](http://OUATO.net). This will set the tone for projects to come and bring like-minded artists into our community. We aim to lead by example, showing confidence in our concepts will form trust between our label and prospective artists. I call this our â€˜proof-of-confidence.â€™

![BTS Photos from the MV Shoot - Courtesy of David Rodlo](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/b7ksyO-_Xdz7dnUm1z_2G.JPG?height=4000&width=6000&&&size=large)

Announcing this first record is a giant milestone as we strive to become a new standard in both the music and crypto industries. The song will be the first single off my upcoming EP, written and produced by your very own. The music video was shot and produced back in April so none of the [OUATO.net](http://OUATO.net) production funds have been used for this release.

We are also excited to announce that we have partnered up with PR firm [Twnty Three](https://www.twntythree.com/) to help with the release. [HERE](https://www.billboard.com/pro/australian-management-pr-firm-twnty-three-opens-us-branch/) is a cool article about the them!


---

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/HsMywlg8JhEQoZmaX0ej2.png?height=1500&width=3000&&&size=medium)

### V. OUATO.net Music Royalty Protocol

Still with me? Youâ€™re gonna like this last one.

We asked ourselves, how can our record deals benefit the $OUATO community?

As an artist signed under my own label, I commit to providing `60%` of the revenue to [OUATO.net](http://OUATO.net). Through our new â€˜Music Royalty Protocol,â€™ `60%` of the net revenue from my music sales will be injected back into the OUATO.net ecosystem, benefiting all $OUATO holders.

**This starts with our upcoming release 'BUGS R US.'**

*(Please note that disclosing my splits % with [OUATO.net](http://OUATO.net) is exclusive to me and is not expected with any future deals with artists. Disclosure of this information will be at the discretion of the artists involved.)*

Usually, the label will recoup the recording budget, and marketing budget, and advance before the artist sees any of their shares of the revenue. Our royalty split agreement with artists will differ depending on the level of involvement with each project.

In our commitment to transforming how artists and investors can fairly benefit within a music ecosystem, the protocol aims to strengthen our web3 ecosystem. Here is a breakdown of how our royalties will be utilized after the artist is paid their shares.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/w80UzxlCZ_Y84Ac4kMynD.png?height=1310&width=3072&&&size=large)

**[OUATO.net](http://OUATO.net) Music Royalty Protocol (v1)**

â†³ `30%` **- [OUATO.net](http://OUATO.net) Music Royalty Staking Pool** *(Rewards for our community)*

â†³ `50%` **- Company Production / Marketing Funds** *(Reinvestment & Expenses)*

â†³ `20%` **- Buyback / Burning of $OUATO** *(Increases the value of our token)*

*(Subject to change â€“ Community/Company may propose amendments through our upcoming voting system)*

Due to web2 platforms like Spotify & Apple Music being the primary source of music consumption. Revenues splits between artists and [OUATO.net](http://OUATO.net) will initially be paid out in fiat unless stated otherwise. [OUATO.net](http://OUATO.net)'s revenues will be traded for crypto to satisfy our royalty protocol. We plan to keep a public database of all royalty protocol txs.

*Full explanation on the Music Royalty Protocol will be posted later.*


---

Building a company from the ground up is not an easy task, reshaping industries will take time and require several trials and errors before perfecting the model. I find peace in knowing that many individuals in the web3 community are in support of projects like ours. Experimental ideas are where innovation excels, and we are ready to take on any challenge the universe throws at us.

The [OUATO.net](http://OUATO.net) team thanks every single member of our community for being part of this journey. We look forward to growing and learning with the $OUATO family. There are currently 150 of us, slowly but surely this community will expand with time. WAGMI.

Please feel free to email me directly with any questions or concerns: [brian@OUATO.net](mailto:jackie@OUATO.net)

\- Brian and the [OUATO.net](http://OUATO.net) Team âœ°

title: poutine
body: **poutine**, a Canadian dish made of [french fries](https://www.britannica.com/topic/French-fries) topped with [cheese](https://www.britannica.com/topic/cheese) curds and gravy. It first appeared in 1950s rural [QuÃ©bec](https://www.britannica.com/place/Quebec-province) snack bars and was widely popularized across [Canada](https://www.britannica.com/place/Canada) and beyond in the 1990s.

title: Introducing Pegaxy
body:
### What is Pegaxy?

PEGAXY, which is derived from the terms "Pegasus" and "Galaxy," is a futuristic mythological winged horse racing game. The horses are known as "PEGA," and players engage in PVP races for a utility token known as Vigorus "VIS."In general, Pegaxy is a game that allows players to earn money by competing in a PVP-style horse racing game. In addition to being challenging, this game can also generate crypto currency, which is beneficial to the players. With so much action building up in the Crypto gaming space, there is no better time than now to start experiencing these games as a player.Pegaxy is a game that has seen a lot of early growth in terms of users and revenue potential.

### The Token of Pegaxy

**VIGORUS (VIS)**

This VIS token is the main token of Pegaxy's gaming and reward system, where players can earn real money by competing against other players in the game. You must place in the top three to receive VIS tokens. No VIS tokens are awarded to those who do not place in the top three. The amount of VIS awarded for races may change in the future due to the fast-paced nature of the in-game economy.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/x1q-hCVakwZyCMf6XbGVp.png?height=470&width=940)

### Energy of Pega

The energy levels of each horse begin at 25/25. You lose 1 energy point every time your horse races, and it takes 1 hour of not racing to recoup that point. You should race an individual horse as many times as possible every day to get the greatest results.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/zA1s6iwaUojoZZqBioKrw.png?height=470&width=940)

### Racing

The primary focus of gaming development is racing gameplay, in which players can race to earn tokens. Mastering the elements is critical, and winning VIS is the ultimate goal. Choose the specific Pega for that given race and use their talents, strategies, upgrades, and foods to help the Pega win

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Z_iEh62OMpDAjvnayBw3z.png?height=470&width=940)

### Initial Investment

* Scholarly Race. You can partner with a horse owner on the Pegaxy marketplace and agree on a profit split of the VIS using this form of earning percent share decided by the owner.
* Pegaxy offers three types of Rental systems; Fixed Rental, Profit Share, and Direct Rental.

The traditional or "real world" renting style is the "Fixed Rental" scheme. In this situation, an NFT Owner just sells his Pega for a predetermined price, such as 2,000 PGX. The Renter will receive the Pega for a set period of time, such as 60 days, in exchange for 2,000 PGX.

In Shared Profit, you may rent out your Pega for free to the general public while investing a percentage of your racing profit back into your account. For example, you can rent out by 15% profit-sharing, which means the renter would get 15% of your racing earnings while you keep the other 85%.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/S9u-lWE0NU1144e-MsON6.png?height=1134&width=1662)

### About Pegaxy

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/daXMO5jn5kP9QOF_lxasN.png?height=470&width=940)

Ken Pham, Steve Nguyen, and Corey Wilton founded Pegaxy, which launched its beta version in Q4 2021, along with its marketplace, rental system, and breeding programs.

The game's development will focus on large-scale rental schemes and the expansion of Pegaxy guilds. This strategy will allow the greatest number of users to play the game for free. A long-term vision is to hand over governance of Pegaxy to the active community, which will have control over future development and game direction.

We can support large-scale scholarship programs and guild growth using the in-game economic model. This allows people in developing countries to play the game for free while also earning money during the global pandemic. This is very much in line with our team's values.

Pegaxy is the newest NFT game that allows you to earn money while having fun. Apart from that, you must be familiar with the Pegaxy game's gameplay and game mechanics. That's about all there is to know about Pegaxy, the most intriguing horse racing NFT game. This game is for you if you enjoy competitive games. So, what exactly are you waiting for? Try it out right now!

**To keep updated with the newest Pegaxy news, follow and subscribe to Hottoshotto on social media. Many thanks!!!**

**References:**Â 

**What is pegaxy fromÂ <https://lemp.io/everything-you-need-to-know-about-pegaxy/> About Pexaxy from <https://www.playtoearn.online/games/pegaxy/ ](https://www.playtoearn.online/games/pegaxy/)

title: Metaverse "land NFT" three popular projects: Sandboxã€Metagraveã€Decentraland
body:
The real estate era tells us that land resources are valuable because of scarcity! With the popularity of the concept of metaverse, many people are eager to seize this chanceÂ to getÂ their firstÂ million. Although most people are familiar with the word metaverse, few people really understand it. Today, let'sÂ have a look at the three popular projectsÂ of Metaverse "land NFT" .

**1ã€ Metaverse "land NFT" â€˜s upstar-â€œSandboxâ€**

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/m0s1FeFd3eg3j9KEakjgo.png?height=390&width=768)

In December 2021,Â the New York company Republic Realm announced that it would spend US$4.3 millionÂ (approximately S$5.9 million)Â to buyÂ a piece of land on theÂ virtual gaming platform "Â The SandboxÂ "Â , setting a record for the highest transaction price of digital real estate . $4.3 million isÂ more thanÂ many peopleÂ will everÂ earnÂ inÂ aÂ lifetime. With so much money, you can buy a villa in real life, so what magic is there in this land that can neither live nor put debris in it makes big companies and big stars want to go in and own a piece of their own Where is the land?

Sandbox was originally a mobile game developed on Android and iOS by its parent company Animoca Brands in 2012. This app is widely used and accumulated 40 million downloads in the early days of mobile games, reaching nearly 2.6 million monthly active users during the peak period. In 2015, Sandbox games were available for download on the PC through the fashionable game forum Steam. Users invented 70 million unique worlds and environments for other users to interact with. This early user-generated content experience caused Animoca Brands to leap into blockchain games in 2019 and bring the other's flagship product "Sandbox" to the market.

The SandboxÂ is a play-to-earn virtual world gaming experience, combiningÂ blockchain technology.

The Sandbox allows players to createÂ their digital assets with free design tools.Â ThisÂ creationÂ isÂ combined with blockchain, that can make the assets truly belong to the players.In other words, these creative designs can also be combined with real brands to create IP.Â In The Sandbox, land Block owners can develop and build in their own digital space, which can be to design community gathering places or NFT galleries, or even design and develop interactive games. These games can also be monetized, and users can then buy land and rent it to other creators.

First of all, behind the explosion of Sandbox is still inseparable from consensus. A thing has value only when it has a consensus. Sandbox has more than 40 million users, but the total amount of land is only 166,646. If everyone wants to own a piece of land of their own, it will cause a situation of short supply, so it is not surprising that the price will rise.

At present besides Republic realm, many celebrities and brands are also buying land in Sandbox. The legendary hip-hop starÂ Snoop DoggÂ is already Sandbox NFTâ€™s main collector and creator. Interactive experience projects were launched inside, including concerts, NFTs, etc. Fans began to "pay" high prices to stay in Metaverse, and became neighbors with Snoop. A collector even spent more than US$450,000 to buy land for this purpose.

At the same time,Brands such as Adidas, Atari and Walking Dead have all bought land on Sandbox and plan to build their own meta-universe outpost space. The gradual joining of these brands and celebrities creates a "network effect" and attracts others to join.

AS fans of Snoop Dogg are willing to pay a high price to become neighbors with him, and Â collectors are willing to spend $450000 to buy valuable land, many companies that settle in sandbox can be together with more famous companies, and this is just a virtual ad for themselves, which is also one of the reasons why sandbox is popular.

**2ã€Metaverse "land NFT" â€˜s dark horse-â€œMetagraveâ€**

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/BccS3UVDfys48TmqwEEY6.png?height=713&width=1079)

Metagrave is a developer and operator of the metaverse graveÂ project in the United States. The company focuses on developing a metaverse platform based on blockchain technologies such as erc-20 for MGÂ and ERC-1155 andERC-721Â for digital asset storage and trading. Mategrave, headquartered in Los Angeles, is designed and developed by Willow, a well-known Chinese American.As the project getsÂ going, Metagrave will be updated from 2D to 3D. At that time, Metagrave will introduceÂ theÂ memorial hall, where users can display beautiful pictures of relatives, friends, pets, etc. These pictures can be photos, videos, sounds, or even 3D models.

Metagrave has solved the problem that graveyards are more and more expensive in reality due to the shortage of land. In spirit, metagrave enables people to open the metaverse world all the time and meet the peopleÂ who haveÂ aÂ specialÂ placeÂ inÂ ourÂ hearts.Â The uniqueness of the meta-universe also allows users to see beautiful pictures of relatives, friends and petsÂ before deathÂ in metagrave's world. In the future, metagrave can even provideÂ these relatives, friends and pets with daily communication skills through AI. In the metagraveÂ world, the people we love never leave.

At present, Metagrave has completed millions of angel round financing, and itâ€™s worthy of being a dark horse of the metaverse "landÂ NFT".

Metagrave's playing method is very fresh.The platform has launched a variety of forms for users to choose fromÂ manyÂ aspects, such as graveyards, gravestones, decorations,Â offerings, etc. Users can choose architectural styles or sacrificial habits that conform to their beliefs and national characteristics to honorÂ their ancestors.Not only that, Metagrave also has many features, such as funerals, sacrifices, moving graves to pray for blessings, family trees, etc. There are also a variety of income models insideÂ the platform. For example, players get income by buying and selling graveyards and gravestones atÂ superior locations, or by buying mausoleums with highÂ appreciation value due toÂ the celebrity effect. In addition, after the project team quits the NFT sales task, it will also decide whether to establish a community department through voting, and they will have the right to sell NFT offerings. At the same time, during the early financing period, users who donate to the project will also have the opportunity to get rich returns from the project.This is also one of the reasons why Metagrave has becomeÂ theÂ world's hottest investment project.

**3ã€Metaverse "land NFT" â€˜s bellwether-â€œDecentralandâ€**

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/QRoW2Ev2IWGKEpuryDnF9.png?height=358&width=728)

Past year , Decentraland The number of users has increased 3300%, And the price of tokens has increased even more .

DecentralandÂ is an open-source 3D virtual world platformÂ based on the Ethereum blockchain.Â The platform was opened to the public in February 2020 with supervision from Decentraland Foundation.

AsÂ a 3DÂ virtual reality platform,Â DecentralandÂ isÂ most well-known for providing an infrastructure to support shared virtual worlds.The platform consists of aÂ [decentralised ledger for land ownership, a protocol for describing the contents of each LAND parcel and a peer-to-peer network](https://assets.whitepaper.io/documents/rJ-nNYZxm/rJ-nNYZxm.pdf?AWSAccessKeyId=AKIAI7X7HAN3A7HLG22A&Expires=1638792299&Signature=in1PHmwtaLqZTu45hvexYAZ27RU=)Â for user interactions.

Buildings, tools, works of art, etc. created through sandbox games on the blockchain will be 100% digital assets created online, and can not be copied to other networks. The real world is a componentÂ ofÂ various atoms and elements haveÂ severalÂ sub-structuresÂ arranged. The digital world is constructed by strings of codes. Reflected on the display end, it is composed of color blocks. Decentraland can also be seen as a digital version of my world. In decentraland, because digital assets can confirm property rights, these ideas can be sold at the real price. From the perspective of real estate, artists with house building skills can constantly design and build beautiful houses, and then sell them to players who want to buy a house but can't design it. With such rich creativity and collection, the investment value has created a shortage of demand in decentraland.

SummingÂ upÂ the aboveÂ three popular projects of metaverse "land NFT": Sandboxã€Metagraveã€Decentraland, we can find some common ground. First, they are all land assets bound on the public chain. The land resources in the virtual world bought by users are the same as those in our real world. Once purchased, they belong to the user's property. Second, they all have something creative, that is, users can design their own land or gravestones freely. Third, their land has huge investment value and room for appreciation.

The traditional or "real world" renting style is the "Fixed Rental" scheme. In this situation, an NFT Owner just sells his Pega for a predetermined price, such as 2,000 PGX. The Renter will receive the Pega for a set period of time, such as 60 days, in exchange for 2,000 PGX.

In Shared Profit, you may rent out your Pega for free to the general public while investing a percentage of your racing profit back into your account. For example, you can rent out by 15% profit-sharing, which means the renter would get 15% of your racing earnings while you keep the other 85%.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/S9u-lWE0NU1144e-MsON6.png?height=1134&width=1662)

### About Pegaxy

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/daXMO5jn5kP9QOF_lxasN.png?height=470&width=940)

Ken Pham, Steve Nguyen, and Corey Wilton founded Pegaxy, which launched its beta version in Q4 2021, along with its marketplace, rental system, and breeding programs.

The game's development will focus on large-scale rental schemes and the expansion of Pegaxy guilds. This strategy will allow the greatest number of users to play the game for free. A long-term vision is to hand over governance of Pegaxy to the active community, which will have control over future development and game direction.

We can support large-scale scholarship programs and guild growth using the in-game economic model. This allows people in developing countries to play the game for free while also earning money during the global pandemic. This is very much in line with our team's values.

Pegaxy is the newest NFT game that allows you to earn money while having fun. Apart from that, you must be familiar with the Pegaxy game's gameplay and game mechanics. That's about all there is to know about Pegaxy, the most intriguing horse racing NFT game. This game is for you if you enjoy competitive games. So, what exactly are you waiting for? Try it out right now!

title: Getting Started with Pegaxy using Metamask
body:
Despite the fact that Pegaxy is a fast-paced NFT game, many students opted to play it at home. One of their problems is figuring out how to play on their phone. This article will show you how to install and create your Metamask wallet, as well as how to connect to and play Pegaxy using Metamask browsers on your mobile phones.

### How to Get Started

Simply link a wallet to the site (e.g. Metamask wallet) and ensure the Polygon chain is enabled. Once connected, you can interact with the marketplace to either apply to be a Scholar and begin racing without an NFT asset or to begin purchasing NFTs to play the game.

### TO INSTALL AND CREATE AN ACCOUNT ON METAMASK WALLET

**STEP 1**

To begin, download MetaMask from the Google Play store and then install it. Here's the link- **<https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=io.metamask>**

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/ayjViWjBFbFyAm0ob0Qo-.jpg?height=470&width=940)

**STEP 2**

Click the â€œGet Startedâ€

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/jhkxDGsVsbKCZFBLW5NAV.jpg?height=470&width=940)

**STEP 3**

Click the Create new wallet option and click theÂ â€œI Agreeâ€ option 
 Note: Before clicking it, make sure you read it properly!

**STEP 4**

Now, create your new password for your MetaMask.

**STEP 5**

Keep your wallet safe! You must remember your Secret Recovery Phrase at this phase because it is the only option to restore your wallet if you are locked out of the app or get a new device. The recommendation here is to write it down on paper or take a picture of it and put it somewhere safe. In the next step, it will be required to re-enter the sentence (in the correct order).

**STEP 6**

To finish the backup, you must confirm each word of your Secret Recovery Phrase in this stage.

**STEP 7**

You now have your wallet, which is in the Ethereum Main Network, and in order to play Pegaxy, you must add Polygon as its network.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/GhQY1sFxaOYh9K8CCH906.jpg?height=470&width=940)

### TO CONNECT PEXAGY USING METAMASK ON YOUR MOBILE PHONE

**STEP 1**

After setting up your wallet. Click the hamburger menu on the left side of the screen.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/XEv2UUb7x7tv3sTS1G6w-.jpg?height=932&width=710)

**STEP 2**

Click on Setting

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/g-M_TlT5aFeeshkhxAJBo.jpg?height=1312&width=697)

**STEP 3**

Click on Networks then Add Network

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/4M5LdoMI_CmhfSt-5pynV.jpg?height=694&width=728)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/1Wsh_xI97UHIX4Q3wRz86.jpg?height=1018&width=735)

**STEP 4**

Enter in the Polygon (Matic) Mainnet settings as follows then Save:

**Network Name: Polygon 
 RPC URL: https://polygon-rpc.com/ 
 ChainID: 137 
 Symbol: MATIC 
 Block Explorer URL: <https://polygonscan.com>**

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/ELsEwNwka3Rjj0OS1NbkU.jpg?height=1153&width=770)

Fill up the blanks with the ff, or go to **<https://docs.polygon.technology/docs/develop/metamask/config-polygon-on-metamask/>**

**STEP 5**

This is the example of Metamask with Polygon network. After successfully adding the Polygon network to your Metamask wallet.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/BxxzTL5t6CkORCr4v1E7B.jpg?height=470&width=940)

**STEP 6**

Proceed to the Metamask browser and add the URL of Pegaxy:** 
 **Pegaxy Website: **<https://play.pegaxy.io/>**

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/qhsDqfBsyobaym9HOvTbT.jpg?height=995&width=758)

**STEP 7**

Click the connect button to link your wallet to Pegaxy but make sure to Connect your wallet and Approve the necessary transactions.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/tQf960IugxcnPtiNlyVra.jpg?height=470&width=940)

### PEGAXY THOUGHTS

The one of collecting or making money in online games today is Pegaxy. It is played in order to obtain a token known as Vigorus or VIS. You are allowed to play that pegaxy using your mobile device and a metamask wallet. Receiving a scholarship from Pegaxy is also not particularly difficult, especially if you are persistent and determined to earn a token each day.

Pegaxy offers a very basic game model for anyone interested in dabbling in gaming. With the addition of a slew of new features designed to make the game more strategy and skill-based, it can only get more appealing to players and less of a grind.

It's critical to comprehend the shift in-game dynamics that will occur once the new, more sophisticated elements are implemented. You'll need to have vetted your Scholars to discover the best skilled ones to race for you once food, wearables, stadium conditions, and player-controlled racing begin. If you're racing against the clock, keep in mind that earning the current RNG system's yield will be more difficult.

Horse prices are directly tied to the price of VIS, which is currently at all-time highs, thus you will be paying a premium to buy a horse right now. Once the market for breeding horses fades, the creators must find a means to keep the need for burning VIS alive in other ways. This must be kept an eye on.

There's no doubting that passive playing may make you a lot of money, and there's a lot of demand for scholars to play. With all of the upcoming improvements, this game has a lot of room for development if they keep the steady economic model they've established thus far.

This game is for you if you enjoy competitive games. So, what exactly are you waiting for? Try it out right now!

**To keep updated with the newest Pegaxy news, follow and subscribe to Hottoshotto on social media. Many thanks!!!**

**Twitter:** <https://twitter.com/HottoShotto> 
 **Youtube:** <https://www.youtube.com/c/hottoshotto> 
 **TikTok:** <https://www.tiktok.com/@hottoshotto> 
 **Theta tv:** <https://www.theta.tv/hottoshotto>

**References:**Â 

**Pegaxy ThoughtsÂ <https://www.playtoearn.online/games/pegaxy/>**

title: Good Stablecoin Regulation is an Opportunity To Strengthen US Dollar Hegemony and Advance American Values Around The World
body:
![Stablecoin regulation is here. Itâ€™s impending. Itâ€™s on our doorstep. And, if we get this right, this is bullish for the USA.](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/qO5QuzBoUDBbAeTGeC7kv.png?height=594&width=994)

## Stablecoin regulation is isnâ€™t impending, itâ€™s on our doorstep, itâ€™s here. And, if We The People get it right, that would be extremely bullish for the USA and the US dollar as a global reserve currency.

 
  
 Commentary on New York State's Department of Financial Services: Virtual Currency Guidance

## Have a look at New York Stateâ€™s Department of Financial Services Guidance of Virtual Currency.

`June 8, 2022`

`TO:Â Entities Licensed Under 23 NYCRR Part 200 or Chartered as Limited Purpose Trust Companies Under the New York Banking Law That Issue U.S. Dollar-Backed Stablecoins Under the Supervision of the New York State Department of Financial Services (â€œDFSâ€)`

`FROM:Â Adrienne A. Harris, Superintendent of Financial Services`

`RE: Guidance on the Issuance of U.S. Dollar-Backed Stablecoins`

â€¦

`Specifically, this Guidance focuses on DFS requirements relating to:`

1. `the redeemability of such stablecoins;`
2. `the asset reserves that back such stablecoins (the â€œReservesâ€); and`
3. `attestations concerning the backing by these Reserves.`

â€¦

`this Guidance applies only to stablecoins backed by the U.S. dollar, and only to stablecoins that are issued under DFS supervision by DFS-regulated virtual currency entities.`
â€¦

### This guidance is helpful to reenforcing USDC and USDPax stablecoins which are backed by traditional USD dollar reserves FDIC insured at regulated depository institutions, U.S. Treasury Bills with less than three month maturity, Reserve Repurchase Agreements fully collateralized by U.S. Treasury Bills, and approved Government money-market funds.

## however, this guidance does not provide for or reference the possibility of over-collateralization of a stablecoin with other assets such as â€œpassâ€ rated loans originated by regulated commercial banks.

All-in-all this is a step in the right direction and there is additional opportunity to connect the traditional commercial banking system with the emerging decentralized financial system using stablecoins.

If the U.S.A. acts quickly to support the success of stablecoins denominated at $1 USD, doing so amounts to a land-grab in cyberspace for the U.S.A., securing a dominant position that the greatest amount of crypto transactions are in assets pegged to the USD, dependent on American Federal Reserve monetary policy and the American Economy.

By supporting this mechanism for creating billions, even trillions, more of USD in, effectively, eurodollar form, the U.S.A. will supply the world with many more US Dollars, which are in extremely high demand as rates rise and capital flees from other currencies to safety in the US Dollar.

This new dollars can come with American values: Liberty (especially financial freedom) and rule of law (in this case, a mix of code as law and US. Federal law). The rest of the world not only needs more US Dollars it also needs stronger rule of law, and America remains the shining city upon a hill.

title: Good Stablecoin Regulation is an Opportunity To Strengthen US Dollar Hegemony and Advance American Values Around The World
body:
![MaxStability consults commercial banks on how to syndicate the loans they originate to a stablecoin protocol like MakerDAO; MaxStability helps stablecoin protocols onboard real world assets as collateral. Contact us at max@stability.business  ](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/qO5QuzBoUDBbAeTGeC7kv.png?height=594&width=994)

## Stablecoin regulation is isnâ€™t impending, itâ€™s on our doorstep, itâ€™s here. And, if We The People get it right, that would be extremely bullish for the USA and the US dollar as a global reserve currency.

 
  
 Commentary on New York State's Department of Financial Services: Virtual Currency Guidance

## Have a look at New York Stateâ€™s Department of Financial Services Guidance of Virtual Currency.

`June 8, 2022`

`TO:Â Entities Licensed Under 23 NYCRR Part 200 or Chartered as Limited Purpose Trust Companies Under the New York Banking Law That Issue U.S. Dollar-Backed Stablecoins Under the Supervision of the New York State Department of Financial Services (â€œDFSâ€)`

`FROM:Â Adrienne A. Harris, Superintendent of Financial Services`

`RE: Guidance on the Issuance of U.S. Dollar-Backed Stablecoins`

â€¦

`Specifically, this Guidance focuses on DFS requirements relating to:`

1. `the redeemability of such stablecoins;`
2. `the asset reserves that back such stablecoins (the â€œReservesâ€); and`
3. `attestations concerning the backing by these Reserves.`

â€¦

`this Guidance applies only to stablecoins backed by the U.S. dollar, and only to stablecoins that are issued under DFS supervision by DFS-regulated virtual currency entities.`
â€¦

### This guidance is helpful to reenforcing USDC and USDPax stablecoins which are backed by traditional USD dollar reserves FDIC insured at regulated depository institutions, U.S. Treasury Bills with less than three month maturity, Reserve Repurchase Agreements fully collateralized by U.S. Treasury Bills, and approved Government money-market funds.

## however, this guidance does not provide for or reference the possibility of over-collateralization of a stablecoin with other assets such as â€œpassâ€ rated loans originated by regulated commercial banks.

All-in-all this is a step in the right direction and there is additional opportunity to connect the traditional commercial banking system with the emerging decentralized financial system using stablecoins.

If the U.S.A. acts quickly to support the success of stablecoins denominated at $1 USD, doing so amounts to a land-grab in cyberspace for the U.S.A., securing a dominant position that the greatest amount of crypto transactions are in assets pegged to the USD, dependent on American Federal Reserve monetary policy and the American Economy.

By supporting this mechanism for creating billions, even trillions, more of USD in, effectively, eurodollar form, the U.S.A. will supply the world with many more US Dollars, which are in extremely high demand as rates rise and capital flees from other currencies to safety in the US Dollar.

This new dollars can come with American values: Liberty (especially financial freedom) and rule of law (in this case, a mix of code as law and US. Federal law). The rest of the world not only needs more US Dollars it also needs stronger rule of law, and America remains the shining city upon a hill.

title: Good Stablecoin Regulation is an Opportunity To Strengthen US Dollar Hegemony and Advance American Values Around The World
body:
![MaxStability consults commercial banks on how to syndicate the loans they originate to a stablecoin protocol like MakerDAO; MaxStability helps stablecoin protocols onboard real world assets as collateral. Contact us at max@stability.business  ](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/qO5QuzBoUDBbAeTGeC7kv.png?height=594&width=994)

## Stablecoin regulation is isnâ€™t impending, itâ€™s on our doorstep, itâ€™s here. And, if We The People get it right, that would be extremely bullish for the USA and the US dollar as a global reserve currency.

 
  
 Commentary on New York State's Department of Financial Services: Virtual Currency Guidance

## Have a look at New York Stateâ€™s Department of Financial Services Guidance of Virtual Currency.

`June 8, 2022`

`TO:Â Entities Licensed Under 23 NYCRR Part 200 or Chartered as Limited Purpose Trust Companies Under the New York Banking Law That Issue U.S. Dollar-Backed Stablecoins Under the Supervision of the New York State Department of Financial Services (â€œDFSâ€)`

`FROM:Â Adrienne A. Harris, Superintendent of Financial Services`

`RE: Guidance on the Issuance of U.S. Dollar-Backed Stablecoins`

â€¦

`Specifically, this Guidance focuses on DFS requirements relating to:`

1. `the redeemability of such stablecoins;`
2. `the asset reserves that back such stablecoins (the â€œReservesâ€); and`
3. `attestations concerning the backing by these Reserves.`

â€¦

`this Guidance applies only to stablecoins backed by the U.S. dollar, and only to stablecoins that are issued under DFS supervision by DFS-regulated virtual currency entities.`
â€¦

### This guidance is helpful to reenforcing USDC and USDPax stablecoins which are backed by traditional USD dollar reserves FDIC insured at regulated depository institutions, U.S. Treasury Bills with less than three month maturity, Reserve Repurchase Agreements fully collateralized by U.S. Treasury Bills, and approved Government money-market funds.

## however, this guidance does not provide for or reference the possibility of over-collateralization of a stablecoin with other assets such as â€œpassâ€ rated loans originated by regulated commercial banks.

All-in-all this is a step in the right direction and there is additional opportunity to connect the traditional commercial banking system with the emerging decentralized financial system using stablecoins.

If the U.S.A. acts quickly to support the success of stablecoins denominated at $1 USD, doing so amounts to a land-grab in cyberspace for the U.S.A., securing a dominant position that the greatest amount of crypto transactions are in assets pegged to the USD, dependent on American Federal Reserve monetary policy and the American Economy.

By supporting this mechanism for creating billions, even trillions, more of USD in, effectively, eurodollar form, the U.S.A. will supply the world with many more US Dollars, which are in extremely high demand as rates rise and capital flees from other currencies to safety in the US Dollar.

This new dollars can come with American values: Liberty (especially financial freedom) and rule of law (in this case, a mix of code as law and US. Federal law). The rest of the world not only needs more US Dollars it also needs stronger rule of law, and America remains the shining city upon a hill.

title: Tiny Bytes: Defining Security
body:
Hello,

A large percentage of my posts so far have been related to privacy but security has been pushed a little to the side. So today, I want to give security some love. I want to spend sometime defining what exactly security is and, if time permits, discuss why itâ€™s important.

## Definitions

**Security** is all about â€œwho is allowed to do what?â€ 

My bank account should let me withdraw money while preventing everyone else

My car should allow anyone people with the key to drive the car

A schoolâ€™s grade system should allow students to see only their grades, instructors the ability to see and modify only their students grandes, and administrators to create new classes and students.

Getting a little wordier: 

An application allows userA, userB, userCâ€¦ to take actionsA, actionsB, actionsCâ€¦ respectively. The application is **secure** if this is properly enforced (i.e., userA can only take actionsA). 

What makes security tricky is that there is a bad actor who will do anything in their power to violate this (i.e., take an action they arenâ€™t allowed to take or prevent someone from being able to take an action they should be allowed to take). The amount of power a bad actor are the security assumptions you make. If you assume a bad actor can break encryption than itâ€™s really hard to protect data. If you assume a bad actor canâ€™t use a computer then itâ€™s really easy.

### Side Thought

Does there need to be a bad actor for security to be important? 

Iâ€™d argue no. 

Rather a powerful actor trying to do harm increases the difficulty. 

There are 2 big things to worry about with security:

1. Someone doing something they arenâ€™t supposed to
2. Someone not being able to do something they are supposed to

For 1:

If there are no passwords, I could still accidentally log into the wrong account. 

I could send money to the wrong person either by accident or being tricked. Regardless if a bad actor was involved, I took an action I shouldnâ€™t have. Iâ€™d argue that a feature that prevents me from sending to the wrong address would be a security feature because it would prevent me from taking an action I shouldnâ€™t be allowed to take.

Where this gets tricky is that a feature that prevents me from sending money to an address could also be a security violation. The security feature to prevent me from sending to sketchy addresses could prevent me from sending to an address I want to send to. This gets into point 2.

For 2: 

In a similar vein to above, I could be prevented from sending money to someone because they are a known bad person or there is a bug. If someone is exploiting this to prevent me from sending money, clearly this is a security issues. What if thereâ€™s no bad actor and itâ€™s just a bug. Iâ€™d argue that this still is a security issue. Itâ€™s also a usability issues. Security and usability are tied together; it a security feature is annoying to use then I wonâ€™t use it (e.g., if I get warnings all the time about sending money to an unknown address I will ignore all warnings). The feature to prevent me from sending money to bad addresses is also a security feature and a bug in a security features is a security issue.

Where this gets trickier for me to think about is what happens if a website is down. A bad actor causing this is definitely a security issue. What if it was just a bad bug. Iâ€™d still argue itâ€™s a security issue. First, if everything is down itâ€™s an everyone problem. Second, people canâ€™t take actions they expect to take. Regardless of if a bad actor took this action you want to be able to prevent it. Are there things that could be done to have prevented this issue from happening? Or if this issue happens again, are there things we could do to make sure the consequences are smaller? 

Got to go. Canâ€™t edit. I like the thought I put in today.

Lucas

title: Start Earning VIS with Pegaxy
body:
Welcome! In this article, we'll look at how much we can win playing Pegaxy, as well as all the factors to consider.

Pegaxy is the newest and most popular play-to-earn game. It's a multiplayer horse racing game in which 15 players battle for the top three spots. Pegaxy is strictly a racing game in which players have no choice except to enter their horses, known as Pega, into the race and let them run till the game is over. To win the race, Pegaxy also relies on many elemental variables. Speed, strength, lightning, wind, water, and fire are among them. And the proportion of each element is determined by the strategic upgrade, food, and talents that each Pega is built of.

### How to earn

Racing your horses is the most common way to make money in the game. Each horse is limited to 25 races each day. The races feature 15 horses, with the top three receiving prizes. 1 receives 42 VIS, 2 receives 18 VIS, and 3 receives 10 VIS. None of the others is rewarded. Because the races are automated, you don't have to do anything other than click to enter. A horse's winning percentage is normally between 20 and 25 percent. As a result, you'll normally win 5 races per day.

The final option is to rent a horse. The game has a simple scholarship system that automates many processes. You can rent your horse for a set price or a percentage of your earnings.

If you have a lot of horses or don't have time to run the 25 races every day and want to optimize your earnings, both choices are quite appealing. When renting PGX, you can rent it for a day or a particular period of time, and after that, you will have the horseback to use, whereas, with PGX, you have paid to use it. In the event of the percent, the rewards are automatically dispersed in the percent that you have specified for each victory.

### HOW TO PLAY

**1. CONNECT**

Connect your Wallet to the Polygon Chain and Pegaxy Website.

* Go to Metamask Wallet
* Then go to Setting Option
* Click "Add Network"
* Fill up the blankÂ 
* Enter this Polygon Chain

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Hn6zr9fCvpgnVZc9XUCH6.jpg?height=1221&width=1080)

* After you add the Polygon Chain to your wallet
* Go to the Browser of Metamask by clicking the three lines in the upper left of the page and then choose â€œbrowserâ€Â 

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/pB8QW5CJXN5-g4HNLE38M.jpg?height=470&width=940)

* Enter the URL link play.pegaxy.io
* After that, Click ConnectÂ 
* Finally, you set up the polygon chain and pegaxy site to your metamask and start earning Vis

**2.Â PURCHASE OR RENT**

Through renting out your Pega in the Rental Marketplace.

* Renting out your Pega means that you are letting the renter race for you.

Pegaxy has two types of Renting: Shared Profit or Fixed Term Rental.

* In Shared Profit, you can rent out your Pega for FREE to the public while putting a certain percent to your racing profit. For example, you can rent-out by 15% profit sharing, which means that the renter will have 15% of your racing profit and you have the remaining 85%.
* In Fixed Term Rental, however, you can rent out your Pega for a certain amount of PGX or USDT. For example, you rent out your Pega for 150 PGX for 2 days. The renter, therefore, will pay you and will race the Pega for you. All profit gained during the 2 daysâ€™ rental will go to the renter.

**3**. **ENTER THE RACE**

When you click the Enter Race button, you will be immediately thrown into a lobby that matches your Pega's class.

**4.** **PREPARE**

Once the lobby is full, you will have 60 seconds to assess the track variables and fit gear to help your Pega match the tracks variables.

**5.** **RACE**

Watch as your Pega competes against 15 other players! If you finish in the top three, you'll receive VIS tokens!

* Select â€œRaceâ€
* Enter the race lobby. Click "Start"

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/qzceEJV-tRd971zgz9r1l.jpg?height=470&width=940)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/27_65vEFFRoK8eTPyPwDX.jpg?height=470&width=940)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/3qxezXS8H5Lw5f8_mIWJa.jpg?height=470&width=940)

* Wait for the lobby to fill.
* You must fit Gear to your Pega (if you own any), and adapt your Pega to the race conditions.
* Once the countdown is complete, the race will begin.
* After the Race, you will see the rank of your horse. 
 1st Win 42 VIS 
 2nd Win 18 VIS 
 3rd Win 10 VIS

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/FhBXpy5xW-JLsnB_bq6ie.jpg?height=470&width=940)

**Note:** If you don't make the Top 3, don't give up on playing the Pega if you still have energy; you may win or lose, but if you're determined to make money, keep playing.

 
 **When you're a Pegaxy player, keep this in mind.**

The reality of the Crypto World is now visible in our world. Take advantage of the opportunity while playing Pegaxy. Pegaxy is another way to get real money today, but keep in mind that you'll need patience and perseverance when playing. There are numerous ways to join the Pegaxy Universe, one of them is to obtain a scholarship that allows you to convert Vis into real money.

This game is for you if you enjoy competitive games. So, what exactly are you waiting for? Try it out right now!

How to Earn from <https://www.blockchaines.tech/en/guide/how-much-and-how-can-you-earn-money-on-pegaxy/>** 
 **Starting Earning Vis <https://sulit.ph/new-play-to-earn-how-to-earn-in-pegaxy/>

title: Introducing Pegaxy
body:
### What is Pegaxy?

PEGAXY, which is derived from the terms "Pegasus" and "Galaxy," is a futuristic mythological winged horse racing game. The horses are known as "PEGA," and players engage in PVP races for a utility token known as Vigorus "VIS."In general, Pegaxy is a game that allows players to earn money by competing in a PVP-style horse racing game. In addition to being challenging, this game can also generate cryptocurrency, which is beneficial to the players. With so much action building up in the Crypto gaming space, there is no better time than now to start experiencing these games as a player. Pegaxy is a game that has seen a lot of early growth in terms of users and revenue potential.

### The Token of Pegaxy

**VIGORUS (VIS)**

This VIS token is the main token of Pegaxy's gaming and reward system, where players can earn real money by competing against other players in the game. You must place in the top three to receive VIS tokens. No VIS tokens are awarded to those who do not place in the top three. The amount of VIS awarded for races may change in the future due to the fast-paced nature of the in-game economy.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/x1q-hCVakwZyCMf6XbGVp.png?height=470&width=940)

### Energy of Pega

The energy levels of each horse begin at 25/25. You lose 1 energy point every time your horse races, and it takes 1 hour of not racing to recoup that point. You should race an individual horse as many times as possible every day to get the greatest results.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/zA1s6iwaUojoZZqBioKrw.png?height=470&width=940)

### Racing

The primary focus of gaming development is racing gameplay, in which players can race to earn tokens. Mastering the elements is critical, and winning VIS is the ultimate goal. Choose the specific Pega for that given race and use their talents, strategies, upgrades, and foods to help the Pega win

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Z_iEh62OMpDAjvnayBw3z.png?height=470&width=940)

### Initial Investment

* Scholarly Race. You can partner with a horse owner on the Pegaxy marketplace and agree on a profit split of the VIS using this form of earning percent share decided by the owner.
* Pegaxy offers three types of Rental systems; Fixed Rental, Profit Share, and Direct Rental.

The traditional or "real world" renting style is the "Fixed Rental" scheme. In this situation, an NFT Owner just sells his Pega for a predetermined price, such as 2,000 PGX. The Renter will receive the Pega for a set period of time, such as 60 days, in exchange for 2,000 PGX.

In Shared Profit, you may rent out your Pega for free to the general public while investing a percentage of your racing profit back into your account. For example, you can rent out by 15% profit-sharing, which means the renter would get 15% of your racing earnings while you keep the other 85%.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/S9u-lWE0NU1144e-MsON6.png?height=1134&width=1662)

### About Pegaxy

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/daXMO5jn5kP9QOF_lxasN.png?height=470&width=940)

Ken Pham, Steve Nguyen, and Corey Wilton founded Pegaxy, which launched its beta version in Q4 2021, along with its marketplace, rental system, and breeding programs.

The game's development will focus on large-scale rental schemes and the expansion of Pegaxy guilds. This strategy will allow the greatest number of users to play the game for free. A long-term vision is to hand over governance of Pegaxy to the active community, which will have control over future development and game direction.

We can support large-scale scholarship programs and guild growth using the in-game economic model. This allows people in developing countries to play the game for free while also earning money during the global pandemic. This is very much in line with our team's values.

Pegaxy is the newest NFT game that allows you to earn money while having fun. Apart from that, you must be familiar with the Pegaxy game's gameplay and game mechanics. That's about all there is to know about Pegaxy, the most intriguing horse racing NFT game. This game is for you if you enjoy competitive games. So, what exactly are you waiting for? Try it out right now!

**To keep updated with the newest Pegaxy news, follow and subscribe to Hottoshotto on social media. Many thanks!!!**

**Twitter:** <https://twitter.com/HottoShotto>
**Youtube:** <https://www.youtube.com/c/hottoshotto>
**TikTok:** <https://www.tiktok.com/@hottoshotto>
**Theta tv:** <https://www.theta.tv/hottoshotto>

**References:**

What is pegaxy fromÂ <https://lemp.io/everything-you-need-to-know-about-pegaxy/> About Pexaxy from <https://www.playtoearn.online/games/pegaxy/ \](https://www.playtoearn.online/games/pegaxy/)
Pegaxy Racing Image fromÂ <https://www.playtoearn.online/2022/02/10/pegaxy-update-3d-racing-and-valentines-day-breeding-event/>
Pegaxy Token fromÂ <https://www.unitedgamers.gg/news/pegaxys-vis-pumps-50-after-new-race-and-burn-mechanics-announcement/>

title: Getting Started with Pegaxy using Metamask
body:
Despite the fact that Pegaxy is a fast-paced NFT game, many students opted to play it at home. One of their problems is figuring out how to play on their phone. This article will show you how to install and create your Metamask wallet, as well as how to connect to and play Pegaxy using Metamask browsers on your mobile phones.

### How to Get Started

Simply link a wallet to the site (e.g. Metamask wallet) and ensure the Polygon chain is enabled. Once connected, you can interact with the marketplace to either apply to be a Scholar and begin racing without an NFT asset or to begin purchasing NFTs to play the game.

### TO INSTALL AND CREATE AN ACCOUNT ON METAMASK WALLET

**STEP 1**

To begin, download MetaMask from the Google Play store and then install it. Here's the link- **<https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=io.metamask>**

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/ayjViWjBFbFyAm0ob0Qo-.jpg?height=470&width=940)

**STEP 2**

Click the â€œGet Startedâ€

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/jhkxDGsVsbKCZFBLW5NAV.jpg?height=470&width=940)

**STEP 3**

Click the Create new wallet option and click theÂ â€œI Agreeâ€ option
Note: Before clicking it, make sure you read it properly!

**STEP 4**

Now, create your new password for your MetaMask.

**STEP 5**

Keep your wallet safe! You must remember your Secret Recovery Phrase at this phase because it is the only option to restore your wallet if you are locked out of the app or get a new device. The recommendation here is to write it down on paper or take a picture of it and put it somewhere safe. In the next step, it will be required to re-enter the sentence (in the correct order).

**STEP 6**

To finish the backup, you must confirm each word of your Secret Recovery Phrase in this stage.

**STEP 7**

You now have your wallet, which is in the Ethereum Main Network, and in order to play Pegaxy, you must add Polygon as its network.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/GhQY1sFxaOYh9K8CCH906.jpg?height=470&width=940)

### TO CONNECT PEXAGY USING METAMASK ON YOUR MOBILE PHONE

**STEP 1**

After setting up your wallet. Click the hamburger menu on the left side of the screen.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/XEv2UUb7x7tv3sTS1G6w-.jpg?height=932&width=710)

**STEP 2**

Click on Setting

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/g-M_TlT5aFeeshkhxAJBo.jpg?height=1312&width=697)

**STEP 3**

Click on Networks then Add Network

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/4M5LdoMI_CmhfSt-5pynV.jpg?height=694&width=728)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/1Wsh_xI97UHIX4Q3wRz86.jpg?height=1018&width=735)

**STEP 4**

Enter in the Polygon (Matic) Mainnet settings as follows then Save:

**Network Name: Polygon
RPC URL: https://polygon-rpc.com/
ChainID: 137
Symbol: MATIC
Block Explorer URL: <https://polygonscan.com>**

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/ELsEwNwka3Rjj0OS1NbkU.jpg?height=1153&width=770)

Fill up the blanks with the ff, or go to **<https://docs.polygon.technology/docs/develop/metamask/config-polygon-on-metamask/>**

**STEP 5**

This is the example of Metamask with Polygon network. After successfully adding the Polygon network to your Metamask wallet.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/BxxzTL5t6CkORCr4v1E7B.jpg?height=470&width=940)

**STEP 6**

Proceed to the Metamask browser and add the URL of Pegaxy:\*\*
\*\*Pegaxy Website: **<https://play.pegaxy.io/>**

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/qhsDqfBsyobaym9HOvTbT.jpg?height=995&width=758)

**STEP 7**

Click the connect button to link your wallet to Pegaxy but make sure to Connect your wallet and Approve the necessary transactions.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/tQf960IugxcnPtiNlyVra.jpg?height=470&width=940)

### PEGAXY THOUGHTS

The one of collecting or making money in online games today is Pegaxy. It is played in order to obtain a token known as Vigorus or VIS. You are allowed to play that pegaxy using your mobile device and a metamask wallet. Receiving a scholarship from Pegaxy is also not particularly difficult, especially if you are persistent and determined to earn a token each day.

Pegaxy offers a very basic game model for anyone interested in dabbling in gaming. With the addition of a slew of new features designed to make the game more strategy and skill-based, it can only get more appealing to players and less of a grind.

It's critical to comprehend the shift in-game dynamics that will occur once the new, more sophisticated elements are implemented. You'll need to have vetted your Scholars to discover the best skilled ones to race for you once food, wearables, stadium conditions, and player-controlled racing begin. If you're racing against the clock, keep in mind that earning the current RNG system's yield will be more difficult.

Horse prices are directly tied to the price of VIS, which is currently at all-time highs, thus you will be paying a premium to buy a horse right now. Once the market for breeding horses fades, the creators must find a means to keep the need for burning VIS alive in other ways. This must be kept an eye on.

There's no doubting that passive playing may make you a lot of money, and there's a lot of demand for scholars to play. With all of the upcoming improvements, this game has a lot of room for development if they keep the steady economic model they've established thus far.

This game is for you if you enjoy competitive games. So, what exactly are you waiting for? Try it out right now!

title: Start Earning VIS with Pegaxy
body:
Welcome! In this article, we'll look at how much we can win playing Pegaxy, as well as all the factors to consider.

Pegaxy is the newest and most popular play-to-earn game. It's a multiplayer horse racing game in which 15 players battle for the top three spots. Pegaxy is strictly a racing game in which players have no choice except to enter their horses, known as Pega, into the race and let them run till the game is over. To win the race, Pegaxy also relies on many elemental variables. Speed, strength, lightning, wind, water, and fire are among them. And the proportion of each element is determined by the strategic upgrade, food, and talents that each Pega is built of.

### How to earn

Racing your horses is the most common way to make money in the game. Each horse is limited to 25 races each day. The races feature 15 horses, with the top three receiving prizes. 1 receives 42 VIS, 2 receives 18 VIS, and 3 receives 10 VIS. None of the others is rewarded. Because the races are automated, you don't have to do anything other than click to enter. A horse's winning percentage is normally between 20 and 25 percent. As a result, you'll normally win 5 races per day.

The final option is to rent a horse. The game has a simple scholarship system that automates many processes. You can rent your horse for a set price or a percentage of your earnings.

If you have a lot of horses or don't have time to run the 25 races every day and want to optimize your earnings, both choices are quite appealing. When renting PGX, you can rent it for a day or a particular period of time, and after that, you will have the horseback to use, whereas, with PGX, you have paid to use it. In the event of the percent, the rewards are automatically dispersed in the percent that you have specified for each victory.

### HOW TO PLAY

**1. CONNECT**

Connect your Wallet to the Polygon Chain and Pegaxy Website.

* Go to Metamask Wallet
* Then go to Setting Option
* Click "Add Network"
* Fill up the blank
* Enter this Polygon Chain

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Hn6zr9fCvpgnVZc9XUCH6.jpg?height=1221&width=1080)

* After you add the Polygon Chain to your wallet
* Go to the Browser of Metamask by clicking the three lines in the upper left of the page and then choose â€œbrowserâ€

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/pB8QW5CJXN5-g4HNLE38M.jpg?height=470&width=940)

* Enter the URL link play.pegaxy.io
* After that, Click Connect
* Finally, you set up the polygon chain and pegaxy site to your metamask and start earning Vis

**2.Â PURCHASE OR RENT**

Through renting out your Pega in the Rental Marketplace.

* Renting out your Pega means that you are letting the renter race for you.

Pegaxy has two types of Renting: Shared Profit or Fixed Term Rental.

* In Shared Profit, you can rent out your Pega for FREE to the public while putting a certain percent to your racing profit. For example, you can rent-out by 15% profit sharing, which means that the renter will have 15% of your racing profit and you have the remaining 85%.
* In Fixed Term Rental, however, you can rent out your Pega for a certain amount of PGX or USDT. For example, you rent out your Pega for 150 PGX for 2 days. The renter, therefore, will pay you and will race the Pega for you. All profit gained during the 2 daysâ€™ rental will go to the renter.

**3**. **ENTER THE RACE**

When you click the Enter Race button, you will be immediately thrown into a lobby that matches your Pega's class.

**4.** **PREPARE**

Once the lobby is full, you will have 60 seconds to assess the track variables and fit gear to help your Pega match the tracks variables.

**5.** **RACE**

Watch as your Pega competes against 15 other players! If you finish in the top three, you'll receive VIS tokens!

* Select â€œRaceâ€
* Enter the race lobby. Click "Start"

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/qzceEJV-tRd971zgz9r1l.jpg?height=470&width=940)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/27_65vEFFRoK8eTPyPwDX.jpg?height=470&width=940)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/3qxezXS8H5Lw5f8_mIWJa.jpg?height=470&width=940)

* Wait for the lobby to fill.
* You must fit Gear to your Pega (if you own any), and adapt your Pega to the race conditions.
* Once the countdown is complete, the race will begin.
* After the Race, you will see the rank of your horse.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/FhBXpy5xW-JLsnB_bq6ie.jpg?height=470&width=940)

**Note:** If you don't make the Top 3, don't give up on playing the Pega if you still have energy; you may win or lose, but if you're determined to make money, keep playing.

**When you're a Pegaxy player, keep this in mind.**

The reality of the Crypto World is now visible in our world. Take advantage of the opportunity while playing Pegaxy. title: 5 Times NFT Generation Proces of Theirsverse NFT
body:
![Theirsverse 9 Series Collection](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/A6zCPDFHlXDaWmKZomV81.JPG?height=3072&width=3072)

Theirsverse has been very dedicated to the quality, artistic value and artists commitment of all PFPs. Here is our journey of NFT generation for thousands of PFPs . We have very strict criteria for the creation of all PFPs.

The First Mixing: On March 1st, We mixed the first batch of 80 PFPs. Before mixing we were worried because there were 9 series and multiple artists involved. They have different styles and we wondered about the mixing effect. The results came out very surprising and astonishingly harmonious. This proves that the diversity of the world can be well blended. Even though there are differences between individuals and even "strange" people in the popular sense, the world is a beautiful place exactly because of the differences. After the first successful mixing, we still wanted to do better. So, the artists immediately made some adjustments and optimization to the images based on the mix.

The Second Mixing: On April 18th, we tried two mixing methods. One way is to mix the effect within the same series, and the other way is to break up different series and mixed 500 PFPs each. According to the results, we finally chose to mix different series, so that the pictures came out more creative. But this time we found a new problem, that was, all the PFPs seemed more feminine. As long as there is a feminine layer, it would make the whole PFP look like female. So we decided to pick two batches of PFPs with different temperaments and mix them separately.

![Part of Theirsverse NFTs](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/oXq54sTWGemjbnSCmqG5Q.JPG?height=3072&width=3072)

The Third Mixing: On May 26th, the two batches of PFPs were mixed separately with strict rarity rules. We mixed 1000 PFPs in total. This time, we remade and adjusted nearly half of the images, especially we drew new PFPs and optimized them for the Rainbow series. Every artist drew a PFP of a different color to represent LGBTQ+ groups.

The Fourth Mixing: On June 1st,Â  based on the results of the mixing on May 26th, we optimized defects on different layers. We finalized and mixed 8000 PFPs and were ready to do the finishing touches. However, it was found that the limitations of certain layers led to a very large amount of refinement work, so we optimized more than 100 layers for replacement.

The Fifth Mixing: On June 9th, we got the final replacement of layers and mixed 8000 PFPs. The artist hand-optimized and selected all the PFPs. It was expected that 6500-7000 PFPs would be prepared for the final finalization of the sale. Ensuring the rarity and collectability of each PFP, the artists have finally completed the unique Theirsverse NFT after more than 300 days, which will also bring a sense of pride and belonging to the holders.

title: a hale expanse
body:
interesting people have a harder time staying in a relationship with one another because they change more.

in committed, monogamous relationships, itâ€™s important to stay within a certain degree range of difference of your partner. if you and your partner inhabit a 45-, 60-, or 90-degree arc, you share enough in common that you can continually coalesce around values, conversations, and actions that nurture and strengthen the relationship. in those ranges, there is enough room for both individuality *and* communion. you can cultivate the traits that make you interesting in the first place, while also sharing yourself and a reality with another being â€“ who in turn has the room to be themselves and hone their selfhood.

but when your identities are set further apart than, say, 120 degrees, the greater arc length makes it easier to encounter conflict or stray in different directions. you start finding that you disagree with the other personâ€™s opinions and values, or that you are growing apart. not that such is necessarily a bad thing â€“ we want people to grow into the people of their own healthy choosing â€“ but in terms of maintaining a union it can become antithetical. 

folks who have relatively stable and conventional identities move these identity chords less often and less drastically. so when they are in a relationship with someone like themselves, their degree range is closer and steadier; they usually stay within a 45-degree sector. this makes their relationship more stable, as they and their partner are more often, or exclusively, in the same boat.

but those who have protean, peculiar personalities wander further and more often. when paired with one such as they are, even within a hospitable arc, their nature makes them propense to relationship difficulties and uncertainties.

are these insurmountable? no. but it does take intentional, committed effort to be mindful of personal wanderings and to course-correct in such a way that the relationship's arc remains within a hale expanse.

we can explore this further when we discuss orbits.

title: Earning More with Higher Tier in Pegaxy
body:
Let's maximize the earnings using a higher Pegaxy Tier. 

### BREEDING

In the automated racing game, breeding may play a vital influence in winning matches. The Pegaxy game turns the traditional breeding method into a paid tool, with horses' cooldown periods and breed counts limiting them. The game's next tool â€“ the Pega burning process and tier-based rating â€“ was made possible by the game's ability to create a limitless number of new Pegas. Breeding is the best way to obtain more Vis and more effective to gain Pega by doing this breeding. You can obtain more VIS the more pega you have.

### Tiered Gameplay

Pegaxy will establish tiers for each breeding type in 2022, with higher tier Pegas receiving better rewards. This mechanic will act as a motivator to use Pegas and VIS.

In April 2022, the new rules for Pega fires were released. Burning two Pegas of the same tier (pacer, rare, epic, legendary, and founding) grants one Pega of a higher tier, with statistics reset. The breeding count of the new Pega will likewise be higher. Vigorus (VIS) tokens will be burned as well, with demand increasing with each tier.

This mechanism will take the hundreds of thousands of new Pegas and turn them into a smaller number of higher-tier Pegas, giving them a racing advantage.

### PEGAXYâ€™S NEW BURNING MECHANIC â€œMERGINGâ€

The new burning mechanisms will include a Pega Merging feature as well as a Pega Level Up system, which we think will use not just the Vigorous token but also the Pegaxy Stone (PGX) token. The actual details of how both of these features function are still unknown at this moment, but it's safe to assume that they're both geared at boosting the attributes and abilities of your present NFT horses.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/3vq3yWN7tQ45ZMOZtYMNB.jpg?height=470&width=940)

**Pega Burning Mechanic**

* Burn two Pegas of the same rarity, then get a Pega from the next tier above.
* The statistics will be shuffled (Re-roll of all stats)
* $VIS will be spent on the procedure.
* The new Pega's breed count will not be 0 (rares start at 4/7, epics at 5/7, and legendaries at 6/7). As a result, levelling from epic to legendary will cost more VIS than levelling from pacer to rare. This merger will not allow you to construct founding Pega.

**Different lobbies**

* The price increases as the rarity increases.
* There will be varying rarity lobbies. Rares will be pitted against rares, and so onâ€¦
* Rewards have been carefully selected to assure the economy's continued growth, although they are subject to change.

### Guide on How to Breed Pegas

Pegaxy is emphasizing the playability of Pegas and their qualities. Breeding systems are also used in the game to produce new competitive combinations. Because each Pega can breed up to seven times, the breeding system is a constant in the game. Each breeding costs Vigorus (VIS) tokens, with the fee increasing with each round.

**What are the Types of Breedable Pegas 
 ** 
 Zan, Klin, Kampona, and Hoz are the four types of Pegas or lineages. The most common type is Zan, while the rarest is Hoz. The effects of combining two types of Pegas are predetermined for their baby Pega. Because the Hoz bloodline is recessive, it will inherit the type of the non-Hoz Pega parent, as shown in the table.Rarities are also a matter to consider.It works in a somewhat different way than we've seen in other games. To obtain a specific rarity, you must combine two horses of the same rarity, and you will always obtain a lesser rarity.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Su6WTndUGSp0HJvAt5t-F.jpg?height=470&width=940)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/F_ltYstvuOqLvWNEGcOP6.jpg?height=470&width=940)

**Do Bloodlines and Breed Types Affect Performance?**

There is still no agreement on the best racing statistics. A Zan breed may defeat a Hoz in the game. Each Pega has a dashboard with transient attributes and concealed statistics. The player cannot see the hidden stats, but they strive for fairness. Pegaxy tries to make the race as fair as possible while providing incentives to choose the best Pegas.

**How Many Pegas are Created?**

The game will offer a selection of the greatest feasible NFTs for breeding and racing, based on OpenSea data. Guilds with several Pegas are the primary source of bulk breeding and coordinated events. As the game evolves from statistics to talents, the full effect of Pega counts will be known.
