title: How to Track NFT Collections and Whales to Find Potential Alpha?
body:
There are hundreds of new projects coming out on the market every day and thousands of legit projects already exist. But most people only want to focus on a few projects at a time. Similarly, there are certain wallets (e.g. whales) that people want to follow. However, it is time-consuming to jump from one project or address to another and you may miss important alpha info.

NFTGo.io launched the watchlist feature, which helps you:

* Manage and track collections that you plan to buy, are interested in, or already own;
* Follow and track addresses (e.g. smart money & whales);
* Follow and track NFTs;
* Discover other people's watchlists.

Let's dive in!

## Build Your Collection Dashboard

Imagine that you have 5 potential collections in your mind and wonder which one to buy. With our watchlist, you will be able to add all these collections to a dashboard. There are some key metrics displayed for each collection added to the dashboard, including market cap & volume, floor price trend, whale activities, blue-chip holder activities, etc. By comparing each collection's key metrics, you will get insights into the collection with the highest trading volume, the collection with an uptrend floor price, the collection with the most long-term holders, and more. 

If you already bought NFTs in some collections, you can also add them to your dashboard. Besides key metrics, tracking whale and blue-chip holder activities for each collection will help you find buy or sell signals faster. The activity section not only includes on-chain activities (e.g. sell, buy, mint, transfer, etc.) but also Mirror content posted by whales and blue-chip holders. Let's say you find a lot of whales are selling NFTs of a collection you are in. This may be a good time to consider selling yours as well. 

![NFTGo.io Watchlist - Manage and Track Collections](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/8RsQxESxYVXN5fr9EM-hs.png?height=1208&width=1278)

## Follow Smart Money 

Tracking smart money activities is also a good way to find alpha. Our watchlist enables you to manage and track multiple addresses in one place. Similar to the collection dashboard, you will be able to find key metrics of each address, including est. holding value, holding value, profit and loss, etc. These key metrics help provide a snapshot of the recent performance of these addresses. If you are looking for potential collections to buy, you can discover collections the smart money holds and collections they recently bought. And you can follow their recent activities to find buy or sell signals. 

![NFTGo.io Watchlist - Manage and Track Addresses](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/ezn3HtrR8Ya5ALHKYpGbV.png?height=1280&width=1284)

Let's take [nftpres.eth](https://internal-client-no-public.nftgo.io/account/ETH/0x4836ae11037f696693c2916834754fa6c2ecc27d/NFT) as an example, imagine you added this address to your watchlist and you found that the person bulk purchased a ton of [Moonrunners](https://internal-client-no-public.nftgo.io/collection/moonrunners-official/overview) today and even during the past 2 days. Given that you have followed and trusted this person for a few months, you should probably pay more attention to this collection. If you are still unsure whether it is a good time to ape in, you can add Moonrunners to your watchlist and wait for buy signals. For example, if you find a few whales and blue chip holders are selling Moonrunners NFTs, it is probably not a good time to buy at that moment. 

*\*Note: the above example does not constitute any investment advice.* 

![Watchlist Example - Address ](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/F1VZW0pVBKpSG495IJ5oH.png?height=509&width=1218)

![Watchlist Example - Collection](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/5qO-bA1eFnvzeSF9yCd3F.png?height=517&width=1224)

Another trick to finding alpha is to follow other people's watchlists. If you find a collection that is added to a lot of watchlists, then it probably means this collection has the potential to grow. Or an even smarter way is to follow the watchlist of smart money. The collections they are following are more likely to become alpha. 

## Create Your NFT Dashboard 

NFTGo's watchlist feature also enables you to track NFTs in one place. If you have preferences for NFTs (e.g. rarity score, style), you can add them to your watchlist and wait for a lower price to buy. 

![NFTGo.io Watchlist - Manage and Track NFTs](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/iKc1JW2VNxxJoXHPd7qHE.png?height=1264&width=1210)

## About us

[NFTGo.io](https://nftgo.io/) is an NFT data and trading aggregator platform that enables users to analyze the NFT market data and make transactions in one place. NFTGo.io offers a wide range of powerful analytic tools and features including NFT market trend and analytics, real-time listings, rarity, whale tracking, watchlist, drops calendar, and many more to help users discover, purchase, and evaluate valuable NFT assets.

[NFTGo.io](https://nftgo.io/) aims to be the gateway to the NFT ecosystem and takes pride in enabling Web3 data accessible to the masses. Empowered by a high-performing data acquisition engine, NFTGo.io delivers real-time on-chain data and professional market insights to make it a seamless experience for everyone who joins the ecosystem.

### Follow us on Social

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/nftgoio)Â |Â [Discord](https://discord.gg/nftgo)Â |Â [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/nftgo_io/)Â |Â [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCaDpaWVaRZDfdszfDCecfIw)Â |Â [Telegram](https://t.me/nftgoofficial)Â |Â [Mirror](https://mirror.xyz/nftgoio.eth)

Note: The above information is for informational purposes only. Investing in digital assets such as NFTs and cryptocurrency brings with it a high degree of risk. Please consult with a financial advisor before making any investment decisions. NFTGo does not provide financial advice and is not responsible for any losses incurred as a result of investing in digital assets.

title: Solutions for effective and agile NFT investing: Introducing NFTGoâ€™s Discord features
body:
![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/FHI3fet-TJNv8eYD6upLs.png?height=375&width=750)

Discord hosts most of the blockchain communities. If youâ€™ve been in crypto for long enough, youâ€™ve noticed the advantages of Discord among other social platforms for connecting with this community. NFTGOâ€™s Discord server is a friendly and warm place for all NFT enthusiasts. Our platform updates in real-time so that you donâ€™t miss out on any new drops and sales. You also get the chance to meet like-minded people and have fun. But thatâ€™s not the end of the story!

We have added various NFT investing tools on our Discord to offer a better experience for our users. In this article, Iâ€™m going to walk you through NFTGOâ€™s powerful discord features.

**Robot support 24/7.**

Itâ€™s a no-brainer that having access to NFT data directly on discord enhances our investment workflow. With our discord chat, all the data you need is only one message away. We all know how overwhelming data can be, when the numbers start to go up or when you feel like youâ€™re trying to find a needle in a haystack. If youâ€™ve ever been in discord servers, you know that bots are ubitiqoues to this platform. Many of these bots are limited to just verifying that youâ€™re a human or saying hi. NFTGOâ€™s bots on the other hand have extensive features.

**Agile assistants**

Our bots are a layer on top of all the NFTGO features. We provide a range of support for our Discord members. You can communicate with our bots on Discord and instantly get back results.

**Meet our bots**

We have different channels dedicated to a specific need. This makes navigating through all the different options of NFTGO bots easier and gets to your results faster. Our data bot supports 4 categories of NFT data:
You can find our server by going to our website. In the resources section, you can find our Discord servers and start experimenting with these features.

For the rest of the article, Iâ€™m going to introduce each of them one by one and give you an overview of their function.

### 

\#1 Collection check

There are two different ways that you can use the collection data.

1\.Full details

2\.Floor price

The full details function gives you the latest data about a collection. These include:

* Total number of NFTs in the collection
* Market cap
* Floor price
* Rank
* Sales

The information you get back from the bot is detailed and up-to-date. For searching a collection, you have to type the command !collection with the collection slug. The slug is just the name of the collection without spaces in between the names. The space is replaced by an â€œ-â€. You can view the full list of collection slugs available to explore here.

Example

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/va6yHv8QSvP6efCAKW4VT.png?height=700&width=1400)

You can also get the floor price for a collection by typing the command !floor and adding the collection slug in the end. This allows you to find the least expensive NFT in the market for a collection.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/mG1Y6SEItv6sO4BOXgh_w.png?height=700&width=1400)

### #2 NFT check

Is there an NFT you just heard of on another channel and caught your eye? Before you had to google it yourself to find the details for that NFT, now you just need to switch channels!

Our NFT checker finds the latest data about the NFT you give it to. The information is pretty useful when youâ€™re trying to evaluate the NFT. Our bot gets you the lowest, highest and last price for every NFT, you can also compare the item to other NFTs by looking at its rank. The rank is based on the last price for that item. You can also see how many times the item has been sold. These are all the information you get from the bot. But if you want to dig deeper, our bot includes a link to the NFT at the end for you.

Checking an NFTâ€™s data follows this format:
!nft \[collection\] \[id\]
*Example*

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/_Rjl6gwP_QKV0dmdd91JF.png?height=691&width=1400)

### #3 Address check

Whether you want to check your balance or view a whale address, the address checker does it for you. Instead of going to Etherscan or scraping marketplaces to find a specific addressâ€™ NFT balance, you can view them using our bot. Imagine in the traditional investing world you had a bot who could get Warren Buffetâ€™s portfolio on Discord!

Thatâ€™s what our bot does for you with any address you want, including Whales. You can also easily fact-check people who claim they own X NFTs instantly. Itâ€™s also so much easier to share it with your friends!

To use our address checker, you can send the !address flag plus the address that you wanna inspect. Our bot gives you an overview of how many NFTs they own and their USD balance. You can also see how diversified their portfolio is by looking at the number of collections. The bot also tells you which collections theyâ€™re bullish on.

*Example*

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/J5U6VNW3qszWFpWt7T64Q.png?height=700&width=1400)

### #4 Gas check

Last but not least, we have the gas checker. Gas fees arenâ€™t friendly to the NFT investing community. With all the fun things NFTs bring, gas is one of the caveats of a decentralized economy. But as an investor, paying for gas is inevitable. You can easily take it to your advantage by optimizing your activity time with the lowest gas price. Because gas price is dynamic and it has a positive correlation with demand for Ethereum block space, you can always find an opportunity to pay less for using Ethereum. Our gas checker keeps you updated with the latest gas price ranges. By looking at the gas price, you can see how much you have to pay and optimize it with your needs. Ethereum miners favor those who give higher gas prices, so if youâ€™re in a hurry and want your NFT transaction to go fast, you can see the gas price for that. Even if you prefer the slow or normal level, it is still helpful to check the gas price before making any decisions. You can just send !gas to the channel.

*Example*

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/mk8ggIHfcpFib_W_fpWUR.png?height=700&width=1400)

### #5 Rarity check

Our rarity checker takes data directly from our innovative model based on Jaccard Distance. It looks for the NFT that you send to it and it instantaneously gives you the rarity score for the NFT with a list of all of its traits in each traitsâ€™ rarity percentage. It is a more handy way of using our new rarity model that you can learn more about here.

There are two ways of checking an NFTâ€™s rarity:
!rarity \[contract_address\] \[token_id\]
!rarity \[collection_slug\] \[token_id\]

You can find the contract address for a project using our website. If youâ€™re on an NFTâ€™s page, you can find the contract address in the info section. Either by the address or by the slug, you can access every NFTâ€™s rarity score.

**Never miss out**

These were the interactive parts of our discord, but we also provide additional channels that give you the latest and hottest information. We knew that all this information might be of interest to you and thatâ€™s why we have provided them up-front.

**#1 Daily drops**

At NFTGO, weâ€™re always trying to find the best drops. You can catch up to all the drops that are happening in the NFT space on NFTGO. This is the perfect channel for you if you never want to miss out on any opportunities for getting high returns on your NFTs.

**#2 Whales Tracking**

On NFTGOâ€™s Discord, thereâ€™s a channel for Whale trades. Whales are NFT holders with more than $1 Million NFT balance. You can read more about our other Whale tracking features here.
In our Discord, we watch the whales 24/7 and get you updated as soon as they make a transaction. You donâ€™t have to manually check all the Whale addresses every time. You can just follow the channel and weâ€™ll notify you whenever we spot a new Whale activity.

**#3 $1M JPEGs**

NFTs are selling at high valuations. Sometimes out of nowhere, thereâ€™s a Whale paying a massive price for an NFT. It takes time for the masses to find out about it. But with NFTGOâ€™s discord, youâ€™ll be the first to get the alert whenever massive chunks of money are traded for NFTs. If you want to get updated on the big NFT trades of the day, you can follow our Big trade alert channel.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/QhKDDt7nrFmaH_0rw7VO_.png?height=801&width=1400)

You can see here that our bots track any big trades that happen in the NFT space. Youâ€™ll get a message with the sender and the buyer address, the gas fee for the transaction and the time that the transaction accrued. You can click on the NFT to view more details about it.

**Wrap up**

NFTGOâ€™s vision is to make the decision-making process for NFT investing as easy and reliable as possible. No matter how much hype there is around NFTs, no lie can hide behind data.

Managing all the data mining processes on your own can be intimidating and hard. We try our best with the Discord bots to help everyone in the world get access to best-in-class data quality.

These are the general use-cases for these bots, but feel free to play around with it on our Discord server and get creative! We gonna leave you with this quote from Hal Varian, Chief Economist at Google:

â€œThe ability to take data â€” to be able to understand it, to process it, to extract value from it, to visualize it, to communicate it â€” is going to be a hugely important skill in the next decades.â€

[https://nftgo.io/research/xHXOwc0ykDXh4tgzgsuuNhsZUo8t8_C8lx9s3OfdgWU](https://nftgo.io/research/xHXOwc0ykDXh4tgzgsuuNhsZUo8t8_C8lx9s3OfdgWU)

title: NFT Whales are on NFTGo.ioâ€™s radar
body:
![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/sFFmzelwiZlfrp3JzS6uh.png?height=686&width=1384)

NFT investors are constantly fed-up with data. The dynamic nature of this space causes information and insights from the top investors (aka Whales) to often get lost. Itâ€™s hard to manually keep track of all the activities going on in the Whalesâ€™ community. NFTGOâ€™s brand new future: Whale Tracking is the solution to this problem.

NFTs are at an all-time high, but so are â€œscammersâ€. These projects can be hard to distinguish if youâ€™re not concentrating on the investor ecosystem. There are no definite answers in this market, but if you see signs of Whales buying the NFTs, itâ€™s a good indicator of the projectâ€™s future. More on that on <https://nftgo.io/whales-tracking> to track the whales win the sales.

A fantastic feature of [NFTGO](https://nftgo.io/)â€™s Whale Tracking is the real-time data from The Whales.

**Meet The Whales**

Whales are Ethereum accounts with more than $1M worth of NFTs. As of today, 600 whales hold $2.08B worth of NFTs. This gives them a market share of 34.10%. Theyâ€™re a major stakeholder in this industry. They invest both their capital and fame in the projects they choose. This gives them the incentive to evangelize the project to their followers on Twitter and elsewhere. Hence escalate the projectâ€™s growth and demonstrate potential to prospective investors.

Whales are on our radar. Not only do you get a list of these accounts, but also you can concentrate on their activities in various dimensions. Whether you want to find the hottest project or the most expensive item bought by a whale or want a closer look at one specific whale, NFTGO.io has all the answers.

![Data Source: NFTGO.io](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/6opBlP8MoTaqiFaLtLK5M.png?height=588&width=1400)

**Rankings in-depth**

We analyze the data we get from the whales in three dimensions. 1) Bought 2) Participated 3) Cost

1\.Bought Cheapest

Whales are seasoned NFT investors and they are willing to pay mind-blowing prices to get the NFT they want. Whale Tracking becomes practical for daily users when we filter out all these transactions and rank the Cheapest NFTs.

2\.Most Involved

But what collections are under these Whalesâ€™ spotlight? NFTGO.io has an answer for that. In the â€œparticipatedâ€ section, you can view how many whales are investing in the project. We also compute the ratio of Whales in that project to the total number of Whales.

3\.Spent Most

We also take a look at the highest prices Whales pay for NFTs. Under each number, you can compare the highest prices relative to the first place. This can give you insights about the overall state of the market. For example if a lot of Whales are paying huge chunks of money to buy an NFT, itâ€™s a sign of a bull run.

**Allowing everyone to monitor Whales activities**

This is the core product and there are many ways you can customize and filter the data to get exactly what you need.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/yWQoqS9CAr-EZBHB4tokl.png?height=674&width=1352)

The key features of Whale Activities are:

* Updated in real-time
* Detailed information of the transaction (buyer, seller, collection, item, price, gas fee and even an Etherscan link to the transaction!)
* Filtering and customization

**Real-time data**

We are constantly watching out for new activities from the Whales. The platform is always getting data from the blockchain. You can update the list of activities by just clicking on the refresh button. Donâ€™t worry if you forget, every time we spot a new activity weâ€™ll give you a clue with a red dot on top of the refresh button. So you donâ€™t miss anything out!

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/SfhTBY3bRVxK2hpAp9c1u.png?height=674&width=1358)

**The devilâ€™s in the details**

If you want to dig deep into Whale Activities, this is the ultimate solution. NFTGO.io gathers everything that you need about the activityâ€™s data all in one place. NFTGO.io sorts the activities from the most recent. You can easily see the addresses and click on them if you want to dive deeper into the seller or buyerâ€™s account. We also give you the price in whatever token the Whale buys the NFT (ie ETH). In addition, the gas price for each transaction is also available in the parentheses with the â›½ï¸ icon in ETH. Finally, thereâ€™s a button that gets you straight to Etherscan if you want to go further.

![Data Source: NFTGO.io](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/RY9jUL4tHds-iJFAqXU-l.png?height=678&width=1352)

**Make the data yours**

Ultimately, you want to harness data to improve your decision-making. This is where the filtering capabilities of NFTGO shine. You can filter out all the Whales Activities based on:

* Collection
* Kind of activity
* Date

**Which collection is the hottest?**

By default, we give you data based on how recent the transaction was. You can view the avatar of the collection for every transaction on the right side. However, you can change this default. Click on the All Collection button and search the NFT collection of choice from the list.

Here, you can see the most recent Whale activities exclusive to the CryptoPunks collection. Itâ€™s always a Whale-favorite.

![Data Source: NFTGO.io](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/ZslIf0HmBgDC9-ZtZGgaK.png?height=675&width=1400)

**What exactly are Whales doing?**

Anybody on the blockchain can do these three things in the NFT market (at least for now..) :

* Buy
* Mint
* Sell
* Burn

You can filter out the kind of activity you want and only view that by clicking on the â€œAllâ€ button.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Kp8j4OBKZQysyNTKGdjOj.png?height=612&width=932)

Below thereâ€™s a visualization of the most recent actions from the Whales. We can see that 68% of the whale activities are buying.

![Data Source: NFTGO.io](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/ipua2SHJWeJSNZ52dyyyW.png?height=1120&width=1392)

**When did it happen?**

We have all the data from the previous transactions. Thereâ€™s a whole calendar available to you. You can give it the time you want and you will get the Whale Activities from that period.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/yvngeH1rAvAxyQMExAgpx.png?height=886&width=880)

**Next steps**

Statements like â€œData is the new oilâ€ are often thrown at us without any explanation. Data is a powerful tool but the gem is the insights you generate from it. You can harness its power to make better investment decisions.

You are now armed with all the knowledge that you need to start to explore blockchain data. Head to the [NFTGO.io](https://nftgo.io/) website and start exploring!

[https://nftgo.io/research/4531Wbxv0O-YiOlfXs14YUfcNgEjUfshqR-ifAnec1U](https://nftgo.io/research/4531Wbxv0O-YiOlfXs14YUfcNgEjUfshqR-ifAnec1U)

title: Does Recession Affect Gaming?
body:
Everyone is in quite a bind with the Inflation on our backs and with the fear of an impending Recession waiting for us. This might be worse just like way back in 2008â€™s  ***â€œ[Great Recession](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Great_Recession)â€*** where we saw a severe meltdown in the economy and the financial system.

Many sectors have been hit with huge losses but the Gaming industry came out unharmed and gained top place with ATH revenues and increased consumers. So, is gaming industry â€œ***Recession proof***?â€

No, I think not! So, letâ€™s see what this is all about starting withâ€¦

## What is a Recession?

***Recession*** is a period of significant decline in economic activity that is spread across the economy and lasts more than a few months. It is a phase in which the economic activities of a country become stagnant, leading to a disturbance in the business cycle and affecting the overall supply-demand balance.

![Source : Wallstreet Mojo](https://cdn.wallstreetmojo.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/Global-Recession-Main.png)

## What happens during a Recession?

A Recession is an inevitable part of the business cycle, which is likely and should arise once in a while to help economics halt the unnecessary expenditure. During a Recession, many countries witness huge disturbance in the economic cycle, including deterioration in the sales figure, increased unemployment rate and diminishing economic output.

Major effects include :

* Increased unemployment.
* Reduced purchasing power.
* Business bankruptcy.
* Short-term interest rates fall.
* Credit availability criteria becomes stricter.
* Causes a decrease in consumption rates and reduces *[Inflation](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Inflation)*, resulting in Deflation.

  (Now donâ€™t go thinking that *[Deflation](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Deflation)* is a good thing. This goes both ways. Like Inflation is beneficial for producers/sellers and Deflation is beneficial for consumers.)

### Causes of Recession :

There are multiple factors responsible and these are mostly interrelated. Like a product with high demand may cause an increase in prices of commodities. This causes lack of supply-demand balance which leads to Inflation. This may get severe overtime.

Most common causes include :

* Demand-Supply imbalance
* Inflation rates
* Sudden shocks (like COVID-19)
* Reduced confidence (continuous fluctuations of prices may reduce consumer confidence)
* Fear of recession (Fear causes all! Psychological factors play a key role too..)

![Common causes of recession.](https://cdn.wallstreetmojo.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/11/Economic-Recession-Causes.png.webp)

## Recession and Gaming :

Many say that a Recession is inevitable, but during these times of economic uncertainty, entertainment sector is mostly standard and Video game sector successfully withheld its value. Most even say that â€œVideo games are Recession proof.â€œ Well this is because most spend time at home during this downturn and tend to enjoy video games rather than movies, sports or concerts because with the release of most ***[F2P games](https://www.techopedia.com/definition/27039/free-to-play-f2p)*** in the market, games are considered to be most in-expensive form of entertainment. (Well, you just need your mobile phone to play endlessly.)

Looking back from the last Great Recession, during ***2007-2009***, gamers considered increasing their playtime with an average time spending ***15 hours*** a week playing has increased by ***1 hour*** each year to ***18 hours*** playtime a week. Now this seems to be an inversely correlated relationship between player engagement and tougher market conditions.

![Depiction of weekly playtime during "The Great Recession"](https://www.nielsen.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/3/2019/04/hoursplayed.png?resize=516%2C273)

> *Also, the revenue stream of gaming constantly increased during that period by introducing some of the notable casual games like [Angry Birds](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Angry_Birds_(video_game)), which is the most downloaded [freemium](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Freemium) game at that time and another great freemium game [League of Legends](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/League_of_Legends), which revolutionized [MOBA](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Multiplayer_online_battle_arena) and [E-sports](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Esports).*

So now begs the questionâ€¦

## Is Gaming Recession Proof?

![](https://www.visualcapitalist.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/11/gaming-history-revenue-1200px-up2.jpg)

According to Video game market analysis expert [NewZoo](https://newzoo.com/), it is estimated that by 2022, the gaming industry revenue is set to reach a record of ***$203.1 billion*** generated by the end of the year with an expected total of ***3.09 billion*** people playing these Videogames.

At this point, the estimated highest revenue will be *45% from Mobile gaming*, *32% from Console gaming* and *23% from PC gaming*. By these numbers, anyone might consider that Gaming is really recession proof!

*But is it really?*

Seriously, the word *â€œRecession proofâ€œ* was a misnomer. It is not that the gaming business was immune to the effects of recession, but rather that it was growing so fast that even recession couldnâ€™t off-set enough growth to push it into negative figures. New consumers/players were pulled in by online and mobile games, especially in the smartphone market which was woefully mishandled by most major publishers.

The industry is still growing but the core markets that most major publishers address are not seeing anything like the pace of growth that would allow them to shrug off the elements of Recession. Many companies frustrated by the growing difficulty of further expanding their audience and resources have instead resulted in deploying business models that would squeeze more money out of their existing players. This would only result in existing customers cutting back their spending or worse, completely abandoning the game.

The downside of these F2P games is that most of these games are freemium games and mostly rely on big spenders. Now will those players keep spending during a recession?

What if those consumers thought to go on a vacation or prefer a movie instead of spending for some game? Now this could be a huge blow to the very ability to survive budget cuts.

## Now what does this mean for Blockchain gaming?

Now this begs the most important question as ***[Blockchain gaming](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Blockchain_game)*** acquired a never seen traction just after the 2020 recession (Yes, thereâ€™s a recession in 2020 due to the Covid-19 pandemic and this well lasted for a short duration of just 2 months so, yeah thereâ€™s that)

![Source : CoinTelegraph](https://images.cointelegraph.com/images/1434_aHR0cHM6Ly9zMy5jb2ludGVsZWdyYXBoLmNvbS9zdG9yYWdlL3VwbG9hZHMvdmlldy8xMjdiYmJiNGYxMGNiN2FlODE1M2VlN2I5NDU1YzFiYy5qcGc=.jpg)

The introduction of ***[P2E](https://coinmarketcap.com/alexandria/glossary/play2earn-play-to-earn)*** changed the demography of gaming industry and laid a foundation for many games which not only provided entertainment but also acted as a source of income for many players in many countries. ***[Gaming Guilds](https://www.playtoearn.online/guilds/)*** too played a key role by recruiting players to provide income sources by lending NFT assets for those players to play and earn through the game and share the spoils afterwards.

But as the market conditions worsened, as many games came up with shitty *[ponzinomics](https://medium.com/coinmonks/ponzinomics-simplified-part-1-b2235ac98676)*[ ](https://medium.com/coinmonks/ponzinomics-simplified-part-1-b2235ac98676)which took off with quick money and this hit hard on the morale of the existing gamers many who became bearish on Crypto gaming.

But on the bright side, this filters away the bad players from the scene and the ones who stay and build rigorously in this economic recession will come up strong and are going to succeed in providing the ever-required gaming experience for their consumers.

***Also, a lot of changes have happened in the Gaming industry compared to the previous economic recession of 2008*** ***:***

It is required to acknowledge how much the gaming industry has evolved since the last cycle. There are some of the core advancements that might fundamentally change the way we experience a downturn.

* ***Mobile Gaming :*** From handhelds, consoles and PCs, gaming found a way into compact mobile phones and became a massive drive to increased gaming adoption. This not only increased the accessibility of games but also erased the requirement of purchasing separate hardware (*you can just play on your phones.*) There are approximately ***2.1 billion mobile*** gamers, ***1.1 billion*** PC gamers and ***700 million*** console gamers. Unlike 2008, the mass adoption of mobile gaming is going to be a key driver for gamingâ€™s continued success in the current recession.
* ***F2P Domination :*** During the last recession almost every game had a premium model with fixed upfront purchases. Since then, many games switched to F2P model which mainly depends upon advertisements and in app purchases for revenue generation. This will act as a factor to onboard most gamers even in the time of recession.
* ***Streaming, Viewership and E-sports :*** Streaming and Viewership has become a more positive way for gamers to participate in the game communities and find a way to monetize. Content creation has been a part of gaming for quite sometime and that content can be accessible to view or spectate for majority of audience through platforms like *[Twitch](https://www.twitch.tv/)*, *[YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/)* and *[Facebook gaming](https://www.facebook.com/gaming/).*

The evolution of *[E-sports](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Esports)* also had a huge hand in the evolution of streaming and viewership. This means that even non-players and non-spenders are becoming more valuable for the ecosystem as a whole.

## Conclusion :

As weâ€™re now living in a new era of economy and gaming has become one of the key aspects of entertainment and by understanding how gaming has reacted to prior economic downturns, we can generally estimate that gaming is not really what you call â€œ***Recession-proof â€œ*** and it is affected by the economic recession based on many factors we discussed above. But â€œ***Recession-resistant*** â€œ may be the exact deduction as the gaming industry strives to withhold its value by providing equal value and entertainment to its consumers.

Generally, many people might choose to play a game which would give them atleast 15 to 20 hours of entertainment for a considerable price (or better free..) rather than a 2-hour long movie while theyâ€™ve got nothing else to do. A game will provide much more value compared to any form of entertainment. Taking account from the historical references and present conditions of gaming, either traditional or *[Web3](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Web3)* have a positioned in such a way so that they can perform well throughout this current macro-economic turbulence.

Now all we have to do is sit back and play games and everything will be fine...

title: The ultimate guide to NFTGoâ€™s new rarity model
body:
![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/cvza9d8862I1XbJmWdK6o.png?height=700&width=1400)

You might have just paid 20K for an NFT, but was it worth it?

NFTs come with a variety of attributes and they get high valuations for their uniqueness. But how do we find out whatâ€™s unique?

In general, synonyms of rarity are special and unique. Essentially, the rarity of an object depends largely on its differences from other objects: the greater the difference is, the more special and rarer this object will be. Quantifying the combined difference between an object and other things within the group reflects the objectâ€™s rarity. Based on this logic, [NFTGO](https://nftgo.io/) uses a statistical approach called **Jaccard distance** to evaluate the real rarity of NFTs.

**What is Jaccard distance?**

[NFTGO](https://nftgo.io/)â€™s innovative rarity evaluation model goes beyond the mainstream approaches employed by products like rarity.tools. The common way of approaching NFT rarity is flawed and it has a low accuracy in some cases. An example of an inaccurate prediction from these models is the rarity score for Ape #947 from the Bored apes club. Rarity.tools gave a rarity score of 168.23. Even though the NFT does not seem to have any unique attributes.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/uzlHzEg40NIiJSi0YWYVe.png?height=1218&width=1392)

The reason is that these models naively add up the traits and the frequency of occurrence for each of the traits. This simple approach doesnâ€™t take into account how each trait contributes to an NFTâ€™s uniqueness. This is why NFTGO has created a complex model that takes a more scientific approach to estimating an NFTâ€™s rarity.

Jaccard distance is a metric for measuring similarities between two sets of data. In our case, the Jaccard distance takes into account the similarities between NFTs based on their attributes and assigns a rarity score ranging from 0 to 100.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/ZxNgWInwvyPLoCQsObxAt.png?height=153&width=800)

The distance between two data points, in this case, is equal to the number of similar attributes divided by the total number of their attributes. This number is subtracted by one to get the Jaccard distance.

We see how this plays out in different NFTs. Our model employs this algorithm to quantitatively measure the similarities between two NFTs. This opens up the possibility for us to estimate an NFTâ€™s rarity scientifically.

**Deeper dive**

This approach measures the **overlap** between two finite sets. The higher the overlap, the lower the Jaccard distance. By understanding the similarities across all the NFTs in a collection, we can gauge how rare an NFT is. For evaluating an NFTâ€™s rarity, we compare it to all the other NFTs in the collection. For each NFT pair, we take the Jaccard distance and normalize the results to get the optimal score.

The process of calculating an NFTâ€™s rarity contains four steps:

Step 1) Dividing the number of similar traits by the total number of unique attributes. Then, subtracting the results from one. (We repeat this process for all the NFT pairs)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/m56XmXLtfkuUEuhnXHLjW.png?height=152&width=1208)

Step 2) Taking the average of all the results

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/_0u7uATV7Kbcyu9DWhaXR.png?height=190&width=748)

Step 3) Normalizing the results

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/OF8pVWPtwhyPJ4ErReZhM.png?height=216&width=942)

Step 4) Multiplying the z-score by 100

**CryptoPunks: case study**

For understanding the model on a deeper level, letâ€™s consider three NFTs from the CryptoPunks collection:

Punk#6089 { Alien, Knitted Cap, Earing},

Punk#3100 { Alien, Headband },

Punk#7523 {Alien, Medical Mask, Knitted Cap, Earring}

![Data Source: NFTGO.io](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/685KSQd4hBHFF3KG6XBNY.png?height=1394&width=1390)

We want to know how â€œrareâ€ Punk#6089 is relative to Punk #3100 and Punk #7523.

We can do this by first calculating the Jaccard distance for #6089 and #3100, and then doing the same for #6089 and #7523. Take the average and normalize the results.

We can see that #6089 and #3100 have a total of 4 unique traits. The NFTs have 1 trait in common.

JD for #6089 and #3100:

J(#6089, #3100) =1â€“0.25= 0.75

Now we perform the same calculation for #6089 and #7523:

They have three values in common.

Thereâ€™s a total of 4 unique values

J(#6089, #7523) = 1â€“0.75 = 0.25

The average of the JD for #6089 and other two punks:

Average = (0.75 + 0.25 ) / 2 = 0.5

If we calculate the average JD for #3100 and #7523, we get 0.775 and 0.525 respectively.

We normalize the final average using this formula, later on, we will see how crucial this formula is. By applying this normalization, we get the z-score for the NFT.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/s4D2f8VzHgYGHoWkcPhts.png?height=244&width=884)

For the normalization step to get #6089â€™s z-score, we get the difference between the initial value we got for #6089 from step 2 and the lowest average value of all the dataset. In this case, this would be its own average JD. Then we divide the results by the difference between the maximum and minimum values in the dataset.

z(A) = (0.5â€“0.5 ) / (0.775â€“0.5) = 0

Finally, we multiply the z-score by 100 to get the rarity score. This is:

\#6089: 0

\#3100: 100

\#7523: 9

We can conclude that #3100 is the rarest Punk and #6089 is the least rare in this collection of 3 sets. This ranking is also present in the actual model. This is just an abstraction of what the model is doing.

In our example, the sample size is only 3 but the real modelâ€™s sample size is 10,000. This is why our numbers are different from the modelâ€™s rankings.

**Why does Jaccard distance work?**

You now understand how the model transforms the data and gives you the final results. Now that itâ€™s not a black box anymore, we can go back to the original question of â€œWhy does it workâ€. This is more clear when we add some examples. This time, from the real NFT world!

Letâ€™s go back to CryptoPunks. This collection has 10,000 NFTs in total. Our goal is to estimate the Rarity of a single NFT in this collection relative to the other NFTs. Keep in mind that rarity is a relative attribute and in this model, we consider all the data from the collection to indicate an NFTâ€™s rarity.

Letâ€™s look at CryptoPunk **#5577**. This Punk has 2 attributes in total. Some of them might commit to its rarity, others might bring its score lower. Letâ€™s see how rare this NFT is.

![Data Source: NFTGO.io](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/mr-CLUnbl_qzeGvvOlmmZ.png?height=919&width=1400)

A good way of visualizing the modelâ€™s point of view is using Venn diagrams. We compare the other 6968 NFTs with this Punk and get its Jaccard distance for each of them, as an example, hereâ€™s the computation for **#5577** and **#6965**.

![Data Source: NFTGO.io](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/bxNEYqwDKO5MVFWiyGO9Z.png?height=919&width=1400)

You can see the rarity score for each of them -which was computed by the model-, and also a Venn diagram of their attributes.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/iMcPEDTBWPSEZnC0_8k3W.png?height=720&width=1280)

The Jaccard distance for these two would be 1â€“1 / 3 which is about 0.7. Remember that we divide the number of unique attributes by the total number of attributes.

We can see that these two NFTs are relatively similar but not quite. The more similar the two NFTs are, the closer the Jaccard distance is to zero. The extreme case would be that if two NFTs have Identical attributes, they would have a Jaccard distance of 0 and therefore, none of them are â€œrareâ€ relative to each other.

This calculation is spread across all NFT pairs in the collection. By taking the average, we can see how rare the NFT is relative to all the other NFTs in the collection.

But taking the average is not enough, we have to take into account the Jaccard distance for other NFTs from the collection. This prevents us from overestimating or underestimating an NFT purely based on its scores.

Assume that we have a collection of NFTs. We want to calculate how rare an NFT is and we do the previous two steps, we take the Jaccard distances for all the pairs and then take the average. Weâ€™re happy because the NFTâ€™s average score is not close to zero and therefore we conclude that the NFT is Super Rare.

Itâ€™s better to make a new example like the Jaccard distances range of a collection is between \[0.4, 0.6\], so two NFTs with similar average distance like 0.45 and 0.55 may have create rarity difference, even if their average distance number is so closed.

Can you guess what the problem is?

This example can help us illustrate the point:

Letâ€™s consider an NFT collection that the average Jaccard distances for all the NFTs in the collection range from \[0.45, 0.65\]. Weâ€™re trying to compare two NFTs based on rarity.

We take the average Jaccard distance for both of them and we get 0.5 and 0.6.

If we arenâ€™t aware of the collectionâ€™s JD range we would conclude that because numbers are pretty close, these two NFTs are not significantly different in rarity.

However, the problem shows up when we include other NFTs from the collection. When we know that the average Jaccard distances for all the NFTs in the collection range from \[0.45, 0.65\], the difference between a JD of 0.5 and 0.6 is meaningful and important.

We again go back to the fact that NFT rarity is a **relative** attribute. We canâ€™t rely on results from only one NFT.

Although this is where some approaches to NFT rarity calculation stop and make conclusions, we now know why it isnâ€™t enough at all and we have to continue with steps 3 and 4.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/i9qboFS4A_QGIrEBmDeFV.png?height=194&width=1260)

The numerator is telling us how close the NFTâ€™s average Jaccard distance is to the least rare NFT.

In the denominator, we have the difference between the maximum average distance (The rarest) and the minimum average distance. This gives us the â€œdiversificationâ€ in an NFT collection. If the collection consists of similar elements with not a lot of rare items, the difference between the maximum and minimum value of average JDs would be quite insignificant.

This will reduce the effect of underestimating the rarity of an NFT only because of its small JD with other data points when this analogous pattern presents itself in the whole collection.

Going back to our 100 colorful NFTs example, this formula will tell us the truth about how rare our NFT is.

**Stay focused on the truth**

Nowadays, everyone is coming up with a new way of measuring NFT rarity. Many of these models are not understood very well by the users. My goal with this article was to give you the ultimate guide on how our rarity model actually works.

Trust is built through sharing knowledge. Now that you know the mechanism behind our rarity rankings, you can make a much more educated and precise decision when you use our Rarity metrics.

NFTGO is the digital treasury for the metaverse. We aim to give you the best experience in the transition to a new world. The truth always lies behind the data and now that you know how we approach this data to calculate rarity, you can go and explore the model and know exactly how it works.

Donâ€™t forget to share this with a friend and have fun showing off your rare NFTs!

[https://nftgo.io/research/kHWaMtNY6ZOvDzr7PR99D03--VNu6-ZOjYuf6E9-QH0](https://nftgo.io/research/kHWaMtNY6ZOvDzr7PR99D03--VNu6-ZOjYuf6E9-QH0)

title: Introducing Artist OS
body:
TLDR: artist OS is a notion workspace designed to help artists and teams manage themselves. [Here](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=K4Cmxk7lO8k)'s what it looks like. 
  
 **Who am I?** 
  
 As an artist, Iâ€™ve played hundreds of shows, been streamed millions of times, and heard my music on television. Then I got into the music-tech world and joined the founding team of a startup called Treble. We launched an app that got 30k downloads and hosted weekly events for 3 years in NYC that 10k+ people came to annually. Now I write songs, manage artists, and advise creators and companies I believe in. I also make websites, digital products, and explore my interests in productivity, web3, philosophy, and spirituality.

**Why did I make Artist OS?** 
  
 Over the past decade working on both sides of the industry, Iâ€™ve noticed a lot of similarities between artists and founders. Most artists donâ€™t think of themselves as founders though because they know less about business. But they make products, distribute them to a market, and work with a variety of stakeholders and contractors along the way to grow their careers. They operate like traditional founders, they just don't use the same language or systems traditional founders do. But this is a symptom of the music industry at large. Knowledge is gate-kept and innovation isn't rewarded, it's a threat. Honestly most things get done over email and text and the systems music companies use are archaic. All that leads to more work spent on the same things and less time for everyone to grow and enjoy life. But since founders in other industries can leverage the best resources out there for their business, why canâ€™t artist founders and their teams do the same thing? 
 

**Thatâ€™s why I made Artist OS.** 
  
 To help artists and teams work smart and grow fast. To ground the chaos. I'll be updating it in Notion with improvements monthly based on your feedback. It now includes the following sections:

* **To Doâ€™s** - a weekly template to manage daily tasks
* **Routine** - a weekly habit tracker for things you want to do for yourself and your career
* **Create** - templates for organizing writing, audio, and visualsÂ 
* **Business** - templates for organizing budgets, agreements, and logins
* **Contacts** - template for organizing people you know or want to connect with. Includes a database Iâ€™ll update weekly that already has 100+ social profiles for music supervisors, a&r's, and other industry folks.Â 
* **Research** - template for organizing inspiration and any link you come across that you donâ€™t want to forget. Already includes 100+ links to tools, templates, platforms, content, and communities you should know about.Â 

For the contacts and research databases, I also included a chrome extension that allows you to easily add people or links to each database in one click so you donâ€™t have to do it manually.Â 

Soooo that's it for now. Thanks for reading this! I hope this helps you as much as it helps me. If you want to get updates on Artist OS and other things Iâ€™m working on, subscribe to my newsletter at [nstar.substack.com](http://nstar.substack.com/) and follow @usernamemicky on socials.

title:
PlaNFT: NFT for Everyone on This PLANET
About PlaNFTâ€™s concept, we have a lot to say.
body:
Conceptually speaking, PlaNFT is a trading platform for NFT+ that integrates NFT into the Web3.0 infrastructure while fully using the other functional elements of NFT, aggregating NFT marketplace, NFT casting, club creation, and so on as a single Social Protocol. PlaNFT excellently blends Web2.0 social tools with Web3.0 infrastructure, the true feeling of the block meta-universe constructed with Proof of NFT as the verification technique.

In terms of vision, PlaNFT is also a platform that helps users create a permission-less De-Social protocol. PlaNFT aspires to be the NFT-based social infrastructure solution. PlaNFTâ€™s goal is to transition the next BILLION people from Web2.0 to Web3.0.

Functionally speaking, PlaNFT has developed a broad technological framework for transferring Web2.0 users to the Web3.0 Metaverse. PlaNFT is a more user-friendly NFT exchange that supports multichain trading. PlaNFT could also provide Foundation Services to assist conventional businesses in solving problems.

 
 

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/J802b2trPzV2h8BBi12OS.png?height=383&width=680)

The reason there is never a definitive statement is that for a decentralized platform, anyone has the right to interpret its meaning and anyone is entitled to use the platform in their way.

The statement that has received the most votes and has received the highest level of acceptance from us so far is that PlaNFT is a general technical framework built to transfer Web2.0 users to Web3.0 Metaverse.

Finally, itâ€™s crucial to remember why we began the process of constructing PlaNFT in the first place. There are many NFT markets with low entry barriers â€” why do this in the first place?â€™ For us, it all boils down to one central goal: ensuring that the benefits of digital property ownership are distributed to the rightful owner â€” you.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/7ZHBb3xeuSXzNPj55X2UM.png?height=590&width=1224)

In our opinion, more complicated challenges for NFTs have already arrived, yet most first-generation NFT firms â€” mostly marketplaces â€” are merely concerned with safeguarding themselves, rather than their communities. Our goal is different. We are committed to assuring the safety and freedom of your NFT transactions.

If you want to buy NFTs today, for example, you must first read and agree the marketplaceâ€™s terms of service. However, a close examination of those contracts reveals that they provide no protection to the author, buyer, or seller. They do not protect you. They were written only for the purpose of protecting the platform and its investors.

That may sound like itâ€™s just a few words moved around, but what it means is that NFT creators cannot create, link, or enforce their terms (whether those are permissive or restrictive) to an NFT. At the same time, buyers and sellers cannot protect themselves if something goes sideways with their transaction (i.e., buy, sell, swap, rent, lend, lease license, etc.).This certainly runs counter to the idea of decentralization.

This is â€˜why PlaNFT,â€™ and how we want to ensure that everyone benefits in a web3 future while also breaking the stranglehold of rent-seeking web2 platforms where you have no rights and are the product. Weâ€™ll start bringing out more features once the underlying platform and transactional flows are out of beta.

 
 

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/ElDwssTpBD0MoKwk12wU_.png?height=329&width=585)

With that said, if youâ€™ve been joining our Discord Community calls or Telegram groups, this isnâ€™t the first time youâ€™ve heard us get passionate about our vision. If youâ€™re just discovering us, we invite you to dig into our past interviews with NFT+and No-key wallet.

We also invite NFT creators to join our Metaverse and produce additional NFTs; if you are an online influencer,want to build a private club or shelve a lot of NFT works, please contact us for further information and business collaboration; we would be delighted to hear from you and respond as soon as possible.

title: CUNÂ Weekly 6.27-7.3
body:
![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/ZkiG-i5Y8YhDo7oRPqPYl.png?height=285&width=1400)

**CUN**

FromÂ Monday to Friday, CUN held daily quiz in both telegram and discord communities, increasing daily interaction amongÂ users. ThisÂ activity now is exercised as routine work.


---

**NVWA**

AtÂ 14:00Â JuneÂ 28Â UTC+8,Â NVWA launchedÂ NFT seriesÂ Mask Monkey.Â The seriesÂ includes 500 NFTsÂ withÂ initial launch price ofÂ RMBÂ 1.Â 

<https://nvwanft.cc/newsInfo/5c4dbcdc39574fbd8f9d3a7bde6d3fb9>

Â 

At 13:00 JuneÂ 29Â UTC+8, NVWA launchedÂ theÂ 5thÂ session of MetachaosÂ NFT series. The NFTsÂ will beÂ soldÂ in blindbox, withÂ 2,592 copiesÂ andÂ price ofÂ RMBÂ 99.

<https://nvwanft.cc/newsInfo/2a5da1c6d45f4692b3c76d83f5dc9b20>

Â 

On June 29,Â SipingÂ Village,Â theÂ NFTÂ founderÂ ofÂ Cloud Villigers ofÂ Siping Village,Â willÂ giveaway special gifts toÂ itsÂ NFTÂ holders.Â TheÂ giftÂ PingnanÂ YellowÂ Rice Wine, is listed in China Intangible Cultural Heritage.Â SnapshotÂ isÂ doneÂ forÂ allÂ NFT holders atÂ 12:00Â JulyÂ 1Â UTC+8, and gifts will be prepared in accordance withÂ theÂ NFTsÂ inÂ hold.Â 

<https://nvwanft.cc/newsInfo/329cfd8a0e7d4e6d97e4a0292dba0249>

Â 

FromÂ 10:00Â toÂ 24:00Â June 30 UTC+8, NVWA launchedÂ the 3rdÂ landÂ sale ofÂ InfintelandÂ (International).Â Users can getÂ corresponding land airdropÂ in InfinitelandÂ if they buyÂ land NFT on NVWA platform.Â Airdrop is only available forÂ buyers beforeÂ June 30.

<https://nvwanft.cc/newsInfo/876fcf08acce436bb1fba7d7441902a8>


---

**Infiniteland**

OnÂ JuneÂ 30Â Thursday,Â Infiniteland releasedÂ a video ofÂ its game rendering, showing a new progressÂ of theÂ metaverseÂ application.Â InÂ the one-minuteÂ video,Â scenariosÂ to be launched in Infiniteland were showedÂ toÂ the public.Â

title: PlaNFT: Functional Introduction & Prospect
body:
Through the previous article, you have understood what PlaNFT is, so letâ€™s talk about the functions of PlaNFT and the vision of the future.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/FWlZgkpMGVf2GttmRKo0S.png?height=623&width=1106)

First of all, letâ€™s start with the trading function of NFT, as a trading platform for NFT, PlaNFT supports cross-chain and multi-currency transactions, the trading market is very simple and clear, in the trading method, PlaNFT provides British and Dutch auctions, you can batch one-click to shelve NFT works, one-click to buy multiple NFT, only charge once Gas fee, which is very convenient and efficient to use.

PlaNFT supports not only image format NFT collections, audio and video NFT can also be uploaded and sold, and there is a unique hundreds of costume change mode for users to create virtual images in the PlaNFT metaverse.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/l7GGrWeBpFUpdHe_2h-YU.png?height=532&width=1105)

In the PlaNFT metaverse, many users are bound to have especially memorable moments, such as successfully bidding on a desired NFT, reaching 1,000 followers in a club, or reaching 100,000-worth of NFT turnover in their Mint.

PlaNFT provides this feature for users, who can hash-cast their memorable moments as NFTs and leave their footprints on the blockchain.

PlaNFT platform supports users to comment on NFT, buyers can see the comments below the NFT to decide whether to buy, and sellers can promote NFT in the comments section, which is the social attributes of PlaNFT exclusive, in the current market, very few NFT trading platforms can do that.

Why PlaNFT is different from other NFT trading platforms is because, at PlaNFT, NFT is not only JPG pictures, it also has social functions, KOL launched time rentals through NFT, and fans can subscribe to that NFT, enter the club, can interact with KOL, get acquainted with KOL exclusive news, and enjoy the societyâ€™s services; KOL then realizes fansâ€™ economic realizations, improves fansâ€™ adherence, creates a high Net Worth Club, and therefore helpful in screening whitelist and airdrop users.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/FvGEX4PyRS9tRCCkGjmjN.png?height=534&width=1107)

After knowing the features we already have so far, we would like to introduce you, to the features that will be coming soon to PlaNFT.

## Function 1: SWAP

There are few NFT trading platforms on the market with a Swap function, and in response to this, PlaNFT created the unique SWAP system and intends to officially launch it in the next version update. At present, player A wants to buy BAYC, there is a moonwords and 100U in the pocket, if there is no Swap function, he needs to sell the moonwords first, and then go to buy BAYC, the middle transaction was two times, and needs to spend twice gas fee, with the SWAP function, agreed by the other party, he can directly exchange BAYC with a moonwords + 100U, which means you can exchange BAYC directly, less a transaction process, not only save the gas fee, the transaction time is also shortened, making NFT transactions more efficient.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/AxC6VBWjr4qD_FpQmpTcr.png?height=533&width=1107)

## Function 2: Polymerization trading

PlaNFT is committed to creating an all-platform NFT polymerization transaction, is promoting cooperation with various NFT trading platforms, in the future, users can retrieve NFT through PLANFT to all platforms, a key to participate in any platform NFT transactions, both worry-free and efficient, security issues can also be guaranteed.

## Function 3: Wallet2.0 Keyless Wallet

For metaverse newbies, the barrier of using a traditional decentralized wallet is high, which requires users to download the wallet plug-in and keep the private key properly, once the private key is lost, all their properties will go down the drain. As a plugin for a webpage or APP, the wallet needs to switch back and forth in the process of using, which causes great inconvenience. Therefore, PlaNFT has launched a non-key(Keyless) wallet, which only needs to bind Google or Facebook account to automatically obtain a permanent wallet address, and can be used cross-platform, every usage only requires Google authorization, without multi-page skipping.

Time-saving, effort-saving, and high efficiency are the concepts that PlaNFT advocates at all times, which should also be the future of metaverse. We sincerely hope that every user enjoys a wonderful experience when using PlaNFT, for which we have prepared a guidebook for using the PlaNFT platform for you, and you may also join the group chat of our platforms and talk to the admin for help personally. We always give feedback whenever receiving your questions. And again, have fun exploring the PlaNFT metaverse.

title: PlaNFT: NFT for Everyone on This PLANET
body:
About PlaNFTâ€™s concept, we have a lot to say. Conceptually speaking, PlaNFT is a trading platform for NFT+ that integrates NFT into the Web3.0 infrastructure while fully using the other functional elements of NFT, aggregating NFT marketplace, NFT casting, club creation, and so on as a single Social Protocol. PlaNFT excellently blends Web2.0 social tools with Web3.0 infrastructure, the true feeling of the block meta-universe constructed with Proof of NFT as the verification technique.

In terms of vision, PlaNFT is also a platform that helps users create a permission-less De-Social protocol. PlaNFT aspires to be the NFT-based social infrastructure solution. PlaNFTâ€™s goal is to transition the next BILLION people from Web2.0 to Web3.0.

Functionally speaking, PlaNFT has developed a broad technological framework for transferring Web2.0 users to the Web3.0 Metaverse. PlaNFT is a more user-friendly NFT exchange that supports multichain trading. PlaNFT could also provide Foundation Services to assist conventional businesses in solving problems.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/J802b2trPzV2h8BBi12OS.png?height=383&width=680)

The reason there is never a definitive statement is that for a decentralized platform, anyone has the right to interpret its meaning and anyone is entitled to use the platform in their way.

The statement that has received the most votes and has received the highest level of acceptance from us so far is that PlaNFT is a general technical framework built to transfer Web2.0 users to Web3.0 Metaverse.

Finally, itâ€™s crucial to remember why we began the process of constructing PlaNFT in the first place. There are many NFT markets with low entry barriers â€” why do this in the first place?â€™ For us, it all boils down to one central goal: ensuring that the benefits of digital property ownership are distributed to the rightful owner â€” you.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/7ZHBb3xeuSXzNPj55X2UM.png?height=590&width=1224)

In our opinion, more complicated challenges for NFTs have already arrived, yet most first-generation NFT firms â€” mostly marketplaces â€” are merely concerned with safeguarding themselves, rather than their communities. Our goal is different. We are committed to assuring the safety and freedom of your NFT transactions.

If you want to buy NFTs today, for example, you must first read and agree the marketplaceâ€™s terms of service. However, a close examination of those contracts reveals that they provide no protection to the author, buyer, or seller. They do not protect you. They were written only for the purpose of protecting the platform and its investors.

That may sound like itâ€™s just a few words moved around, but what it means is that NFT creators cannot create, link, or enforce their terms (whether those are permissive or restrictive) to an NFT. At the same time, buyers and sellers cannot protect themselves if something goes sideways with their transaction (i.e., buy, sell, swap, rent, lend, lease license, etc.).This certainly runs counter to the idea of decentralization.

This is â€˜why PlaNFT,â€™ and how we want to ensure that everyone benefits in a web3 future while also breaking the stranglehold of rent-seeking web2 platforms where you have no rights and are the product. Weâ€™ll start bringing out more features once the underlying platform and transactional flows are out of beta.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/ElDwssTpBD0MoKwk12wU_.png?height=329&width=585)

With that said, if youâ€™ve been joining our Discord Community calls or Telegram groups, this isnâ€™t the first time youâ€™ve heard us get passionate about our vision. If youâ€™re just discovering us, we invite you to dig into our past interviews with NFT+and No-key wallet.

We also invite NFT creators to join our Metaverse and produce additional NFTs; if you are an online influencer,want to build a private club or shelve a lot of NFT works, please contact us for further information and business collaboration; we would be delighted to hear from you and respond as soon as possible.

Our club function is web3 on-chain, and the following are the reasons why we are launching this function.

First of all, Web3.0 is user-centric and emphasizes user-owned autonomy. Users are given Self-Sovereign Identity (SSI) to manage their own identity. Users do not need to open an account on the Internet platform but identify each otherâ€™s digital identity through the signature and verification mechanism of public and private keys.

Second, our club gives all users true data autonomy, breaking the natural monopoly of data controllers under the centralized model.

The purpose of our club using web3 is to enhance the autonomy of users in front of the algorithm. Smart contracts are fully functional, flexible, and controllable programs that can be invoked on a distributed ledger, with the advantages of transparency and trustworthiness, automatic execution, and enforced performance.

Finally, we aspire to build new relationships of trust and collaboration with our users. In the Web 1.0 and 2.0 era, users did not trust the Internet platform enough. Web 3.0, on the other hand, is not centralized, there is no single platform to control, and there are multiple providers of any one service. Platforms are connected through distributed protocols, users and builders have equal rights, and there is no question of who controls whom, which is the significant advantage of Web3.0 as a distributed infrastructure.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/DvXObtqxl48RdPtmRpp7Q.png?height=720&width=1280)

After KOL builds a club, the on-chain identity is authenticated through NFT, and users who pass Proof of NFT verification can enter Telegram/Discord designated clubs and enjoy club resources.

This is a perfect combination of Web2.0 social tools and Web3.0 infrastructure, which truly realizes the block meta-universe building with Proof of NFT as the verification method.

KOLs rent time in Web2.0 social networks (Telegram/Discord, etc.).

The club uses on-chain verification, and NFT holders can join as members, whose information is stored on the chain and theoretically never lost and damaged.

Fans use purchased NFTs and initiate requests from their wallets to join the campaign.

PlaNFT empowers NFT with Social function, through the function of Club, KOL realizes fan economy cash, improves fan stickiness, creates a high-net-worth club, helps to screen whitelist and airdrop users, etc. KOL fans can subscribe to NFT, enter the club, interact with KOL and enjoy the resources of that club.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/EzV3q2RAiSG7WKVxPuelJ.png?height=450&width=800)

title: PlaNFT: Unique SWAP function available now!
body:
Is there any reason why NFT canâ€™t be traded like cryptocurrencies?

To answer this question, one must first understand the differences between NFT and cryptocurrencies. Cryptocurrencies, like metal money and paper money, are fungible and can be exchanged as general equivalents. Non-fungible tokens (NFT) are a type of non-fungible token that are inherently different.

NFTs are less monetary-like than normalized tokens because of their unique nature, and they are rarely utilized as cash in the metaverse, instead of serving as a unique identifier of identity and things.

The metaverseâ€™s economic system is provided by fungible cryptocurrencies, while NFTs supply the metaverse with independent identity and ownership of virtual things. Although they are both based on the blockchain, they are fundamentally different. People appear to have grown accustomed to purchasing NFT using bitcoin, although there are undoubtedly some drawbacks to doing so. If you wish to buy an NFT, you must exchange the type of cryptocurrency needed by the associated seller and then opt to buy it afterward, similar to going to a specific country and needing to exchange the corresponding currency.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/RLi7vowQtaihI7HGb2UhC.png?height=318&width=785)

NFT Swap is a new transaction method of PlaNFT Marketplace that allows users to exchange NFT transactions directly, saving Gas fees while increasing the efficiency and liquidity of NFT transactions. It presently supports the following four situations.

1. A NFT for B NFT
2. A NFT+ multiple ERC20 tokens for B NFT
3. A NFT+B NFT for C NFT
4. A NFT+ multiple ERC20 tokens to B NFT+ multiple ERC20 tokens

Harvey can exchange with James for 100ETH + his Moonbirds NFT if James has a BAYC NFT worth 130ETH to sell and Harvey has a Moonbirds worth 30ETH and wants to buy Jamesâ€™ BAYC. If James agrees to swap, the transaction can be completed using the Swap function on the PlaNFT platform.

James can also add Harvey as a friend through the Telegram account he left on the PlaNFT platform for private communication. Eventually, the transaction can be carried out at a price acceptable to both parties, and if they make a deal successful, both sides of the transaction can exchange directly. The entire transaction process eliminates intermediate transaction linkages, requiring only one payment of the Gas Fee, which not only lowers transaction costs but also minimizes transaction time, making it incredibly convenient and quick.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Xfle4RKP7o8rz3xXKBv2c.png?height=497&width=1108)

Thatâ€™s the new experience of Swap Social + NFT, which integrates NFT trading and social networking, improving NFT liquidity and trading efficiency while building a communication bridge between the two sides of the transaction and successfully expanding the playersâ€™ social network.

We are currently opening the shopping cart function as an NFT trading platform; users can add NFT to the alternative list via the shopping cart to facilitate future searches and purchases.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/PcUj2Lcaq5NlQRt_wFL1r.png?height=480&width=854)

Whether you are a Gamefi player or an NFT artist looking to sell your NFT for cryptocurrency to join another Gamefi project or want to swap your work with other NFT artists to enrich your inventory, you can advertise your NFT and corresponding needs on PlaNFTâ€™s SWAP page.

Currently, PlaNFT has a number of NFTs for trade on its SWAP page and PlaNFT is in talks with several Gamefi projects about collaborating. plaNFT is constantly evolving and we sincerely hope you can join us to help create the PlaNFT metaverse.

title: PlaNFT: KOL Club Identity Card â€” NFT Auction Contest
body:
PlaNFT â€” The First Global Web3.0 Social & NFT Trading Platform

As a trading platform with NFT functional features, PlaNFT embeds NFT into Web3.0 infrastructure, forming the unified Social Protocol by combining NFT Marketplace, NFT Minting and club establishing.

Perfectly integrating Web2.0 social tools with Web3.0 infrastructure, PlaNFT covers a basic function to establish the Blockchain Metaverse in the way of Proof of NFT Verification.

PlaNFT celebrates the number of Twitter followers over 10, 000 by launching the KOL Club Identity Card â€” NFT Auction Contest, allowing more users to experience the NFT+ social feature Club, and then build their own high-net-worth club.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/tP2zjIRvBGb-TDoMQwWUa.png?height=2622&width=1400)

How to participate in our contest:

1\.Send â€œKOL Club Identity Card â€” NFT Auction Contest & your wallet addressâ€ to â€” support@planft.com

2\. Send a private message to PlaNFT official Twitter or Telegram/Discord admins

During the contest period, the more club identity cards â€” NFTs auctioned out by KOL, the higher the club ranking, the more generous the reward!

For Champion:1 winner, rewarded 500USDT + 1 NFT + PlaNFT Twitter Pin for 1 week + 100% fans airdrop whitelist

For Second Place: 1 winner, 300 USDT + 80% fans whitelist

For Third Place: 1 winner, 100 USDT + 50% fans whitelist

For 4th-30th: 30 USDT + 20% fans whitelist

Contest will start from: June 28, 2022 00:00 to July 12, 2022 00:00 (UTC+8)

Come&Start building your own personal high-net-worth Club journey, or join the club to compete for a spot on the Airdrop Whitelist!

Twitter: <https://twitter.com/Planft_web3>

title: WIP38 Formal Voting Begins!
body:
![](https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/1\*VWnu11PFOQDHlyZWjhEedw.png)

## WIP38 Review

In this proposal, the core development team proposes a specific plan for WePiggy to be deployed on the Moonbeam mainnet, and makes appropriate explanations to the relevant content to clarify the specific reasons and motivations as much as possible.

**Option:**

Option 1: For this plan

Option 2: Against this plan

The core development team will implement this proposal according to the option with the most votes in this voting.

For more details, check here: <https://gov.wepiggy.com/t/topic/1250>

## Formal Voting

Now, community members can vote through the formal voting website: [https://vote.wepiggy.com](https://vote.wepiggy.com/).

**Voting Network:** Please switch to **Ethereum Mainnet** to vote

\*\*Timeï¼š\*\*2022/05/20 15:00â€“2022/05/22 15:00 (UTC+8 Time)

**Voting group:** WPC holders on Ethereum, OKC, BNB Chain, Polygon, HECO, Arbitrum, Optimism, Moonriver, Harmony, Oasis Emerald and Aurora mainnet.

**Voting power calculation:**

The system will take snapshots of all user addresses at 0:00 every day, and calculate the total amount of WPC held by each user on all chains.

The voting power of each user in this voting is based on the snapshot taken at 0:00 on the voting day, one WPC one vote.

## Tutorial of votingï¼š

[https://www.yuque.com/go/doc/16072783](https://www.yuque.com/go/doc/16072783)

title: Important Announcement: WIP37 Delisting Some Assets to Ensure the Security of the Protocol (Phase 1)
body:
![](https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/1\*uQTCJh73Gn\_1\_m5YpT1pqw.png)

## WIP37 Delisting Execution (Phase 1)

WePiggy has delisted some assets according to WIP37 on 2022/5/24 (Phase 1) as below schedule:

1.  Set the WPC distribution reward to 0 WPC/block;
2.  Disable the borrow function, the withdraw\&repay functions are not affected. You can find the delisted assets on the â€œMy Assetsâ€ and perform withdraw/repay;
3.  Adjust the reserve factor to 100%

## Delisting Schedule

![](https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/1\*VZE-nz2NBSyS2rOZZlDQuw.png)

## Delisting Execution (Phase 2)

2022/6/13: **Adjust LTV ratio of all delisted assets to 0%**

## Important Advice

To prevent liquidation due to the adjustment of the LTV ratio, the core development team recommends that **all users who used the above assets as collateral and borrowed any assets** should repay immediately and withdraw all above assets.

In addition, to thoroughly implement the delisting process, it is hoped that **all users who have used any other assets as collateral and borrowed the above assets, please repay your borrowings immediately.**

title: WePiggy Launches on Moonbeam Mainnet Soon!
body:
![](https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/1\*Aq\_0XZ8Dx7LWgtHNpFl7Cg.png)

WePiggy Lending Protocol is expected to launch on Moonbeam at 15:00 (UTC+8) on May 30, 2022 (Monday) and enable the liquidity mining program on Moonbeam at the same time.

WePiggy-Moonbeam will first launch the lending markets for USDC, USDT, DAI, ETH, WBTC and GLMR, other assets will be listed based on actual conditions after the lending protocol is in stable operation.

To encourage users to experience WePiggy-Moonbeam lending protocol, WePiggy will release Moonbeam exclusive events soon. Stay tuned!

## About Moonbeam

Moonbeam is an Ethereum-compatible smart contract platform on the Polkadot network that makes it easy to build natively interoperable applications. This Ethereum compatibility allows developers to deploy existing Solidity smart contracts and DApp frontends to Moonbeam with minimal changes. Following Moonriverâ€™s tremendous success on Kusama as the most active deployment destination for over 80 DApps, Moonbeam benefits from the shared security of the Polkadot relay chain and integrations with other chains that are connected to Polkadot.

[Telegram](https://github.com/PureStake/moonbeam) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/moonbeamnetwork) | [Discord](https://discord.com/invite/PfpUATX) | [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/c/MoonbeamNetwork?sub_confirmation=1)** | **[GitHub](https://github.com/PureStake/moonbeam) | [Website](https://moonbeam.network/)

## About WePiggy

WePiggy is an open-source, non-custodial, crypto asset lending market protocol. In WePiggyâ€™s market, users can deposit their crypto assets to earn interest, or borrow other crypto assets by paying interest. WePiggy aims to spread the benefits of cryptocurrencyâ€™s freedom and transparency to the widest possible user community in a more friendly and simple way, as well as be a good partner for them in wealth management.

[Website](https://wepiggy.com/)** | **[Twitter](https://twitter.com/wepiggydotcom)** | **[Medium](https://wepiggy-com.medium.com/)** | **[Forum](https://gov.wepiggy.com/)** | **[Discord](https://discord.gg/pew9k58)** | **[Github](https://github.com/WePiggy)** | **[Telegram](https://t.me/wepiggy)

title: WePiggy Officially Launches on Moonbeam Mainnet
body:
![](https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/1\*52BiNVzwqJVtThB7BY9ePA.png)

## Officially Launches on Moonbeam Mainnet

WePiggy lending protocol has been officially launched on the Moonbeam at 15:00 (UTC+8) on May 30, 2022!

WePiggy on Moonbeam Network will first launch the USDC, USDT, DAI, ETH, WBTC and GLMR, lending markets, other assets will be listed based on actual conditions after the lending protocol is in stable operation.

Experience WePiggy on Moonbeam Network now: [https://app.wepiggy.io](https://app.wepiggy.io/) (Switch node to Moonbeam)

## WePiggy-Moonbeam Network Liquidity Mining Program Has Been Enabled at the Same Time

WePiggy lending protocol is expected to start liquidity mining on Moonbeam at 15:00 (UTC+8) on May 30, 2022!

Every day, a certain amount of WPC will be allocated to each market of the WePiggy-Moonbeam lending protocol according to different weights.

Within each market, 50% of the distribution is earned by depositors, and 50% by borrowers.

title: Daily observation 7/4
body:
Over 100 days conflict , the standoff between Ukraine and Russian is having impact on  countries globally!

Thanks to Bitcoin, I can retire from my 9 to 5, and now I work for 24/7.

[https://twitter.com/Cov_duk/status/1543556645849944069](https://twitter.com/Cov_duk/status/1543556645849944069)

1\. The Sunk Cost Fallacy.

When youâ€™re losing money, itâ€™s hard to cut your losses.

I failed to cut losses in time because I thought â€œIâ€™m down 50% already, how much lower can we goâ€

And every time I did this, I regretted it. 50% is better than 0.

Cut your losses.

**Particulary in the bear market for cryptocurrencie, your shitcoin or memecoin can loss 90% after a 90% decline.Because they are worthless.**

**Not to mentin those Altcoinsï¼Œ both Bitcoin and ETH  have experienced**

**have experienced decline of at leat 80%.**

2\. FOMO

Itâ€™s very easy to resist the urge of aping into a coin thatâ€™s pumping.

Everyone is talking about it. Everyone made millions, except you.

Itâ€™s super hard to resist the urge of joining them.

Iâ€™ve done this countless times & itâ€™s always ended up in losses.
